Awa Kamaté,  qui est la présidente du groupe fait l’achat et la vente des habillements.  Elle est très sollicitée car elle occupe une bonne place au marché de Darsalam.
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, des habits de différentes sortes. Elle se procure de ces marchandises au  grand marché de Koutiala en gros pour les  revendre en détail  au comptant et a crédit  à une clientèle composée essentiellement  de  femmes.
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Sérieux comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 55 000FCFA chacune au  cours de ce cycle, Awa Kamaté  elle,  compte réaliser 65 000 FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses courantes de la famille. 
Le groupe Sérieux est un constitué de cinq femmes qui vivent dans le même quartier, Darsalam de la ville de Koutiala, dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et co épouses. Elles ont en moyenne 36 ans, sont mariées et mères d’au moins 3 enfants.
Ce groupe sérieux fait l’achat et la vente de produits cosmétiques, d’habillements  de  bois de chauffe et des fruits et légumes.
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles viennent d’avoir leur premier prêt de groupe.  
Awa Kamaté,  qui est la présidente du groupe fait l’achat et la vente des habillements.  Elle est très sollicitée car elle occupe une bonne place au marché de Darsalam.
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, des habits de différentes sortes. Elle se procure de ces marchandises au  grand marché de Koutiala en gros pour les  revendre en détail  au comptant et a crédit  à une clientèle composée essentiellement  de  femmes.
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Sérieux comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 55 000FCFA chacune au  cours de ce cycle, Awa Kamaté  elle,  compte réaliser 65 000 FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses courantes de la famille.
texts.en: The Sérieux group consists of five women who live in the same neighborhood, Darsalam, in the city of Koutiala. They live in large traditional families with their husbands, children and co-wives. On average, they are 42 years old, married and have at least 3 children.The Sérieux  group buys and sells cosmetics, clothing, firewood and fruits and vegetables.  In order to expand their businesses, the group decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They just had their first group loan.  Awa Kamaté, who is the leader of the group, buys and sells clothing.    She is in high demand because she is located at a good place at the Darsalam market.  She plans to use her loan to buy different kinds of clothing. She obtains these goods wholesale at the Koutiala Grand Market and sells them retail for cash and credit to a largely female clientele. While the other Sérieux group members expect to make a profit of 55,000 CFA each during this cycle, Awa Kamaté expects to make 65,000 CFA.  As well as repaying the loans, they use  part of their  income to provide for their families’ everyday expenses.

loans.use: Purchase of clothing

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es: La Señora Bernardina se dedica a la venta de sabanas edredones y cortinas, esta actividad sostiene a su familia y es una fuente de ingresos para su hogar, ella vive en casa de su suegra.  Tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad quien indica ella es el motor que da fuerzas a su vida, su esposo es asalariado pero en sus tiempos libres le ayuda en el negocio ó en el cuidado de su hijo, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería al por mayor de sabanas y cortinas ya que estas fiestas de fin de año tiene mucha venta también quiere comprar manteles con estampados navideños para esta fechas, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Bernardina sells sheets, comforters and drapes.  This activity supports her family and is a source of income for her household.  She lives in her mother-in-law's house.  Bernardina has a 3 year-old child who she says is the driving force in her life.  Her husband earns a wage but in his spare time he helps her with her business or in caring for their son.

Bernardina will use her loan money to buy merchandise wholesale: sheets and drapes.  The end-of-year festive season means a lot of sales for her.  She would also like to buy tablecloths with Christmas prints to sell this season.  Bernardina is a very hard-working person and she is grateful to the institution for the support she has received.

loans.use: To buy sheets, comforters and drapes

loans.name: Martha Elva

texts.es: La. Sra. Martha le acaban de dar su casa y ella se encuentra muy contenta pues vivía con su mama y ahora que le dio su casa Infonavit quiere aprovechar su saldo para levantar una barda en la parte trasera de su casa ya que su esposo trabaja la mayoría de los días fuera de la ciudad y ella se queda sola con sus hijos y la ubicación de su casa esta a las orillas de la ciudad por lo cual se sentiría mas segura de su persona y patrimonio con la construcción de la barda  pues ella tiene que salir a trabajar.
texts.en: Martha has just been given a house and she is very happy because she used to live with her mom.  Now that she has received a house from Infonavit (a government program that provides low-cost mortgages to working families so they can buy small starter homes), she would like to use her wages to build a perimeter wall around the back of the house since her husband works outside of the city most days and she is left alone with the children.  Her house is located on the outskirts of the city and she feels that she would be personally safer and her home would be safer if she could build a wall since she has to go out to work.

loans.use: To build a perimeter wall outside her home

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Angelica Berenice

texts.es:
Angélica de 25 años, debido a los pocos ingresos que tenía para su familia hace años atrás la mama le ayudo con un pequeño capital de trabajo para que comprara papelería. 

Viviendo en una zona periurbana y caracterizada porque está rodeada de un estero salada ha estado trabajando con ayuda de su mama para mantener a sus dos hijos ya que se separo de su esposo y ella mantiene el hogar. En la actualidad vende cuadernos a $ 1.50, plumas $ 0.30, marcadores, juguetes por la época de navidad.  Trabaja desde las 08h30am hasta las 20h30pm.  

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar con el préstamo vitrinas, juguetes, papelería. En el futuro quiere comprar su propia casa ya que vive con la mama y que sus hijos termine sus estudios con éxito.
texts.en:
Angélica is 25 years old.  A few years back she had very little income with which to support her family so her mom helped out by giving her a little bit of working capital to buy some stationery items.

Angélica lives in a peri-urban area which is surrounded by a salt marsh.  She has been working with her mom's help to support her two children since she is separated from her husband and she supports her household.  She currently sells exercise books for $1.50, pens for $0.30, markers and toys for the Christmas season.  She works from 8.30am to 8.30pm.

To continue in her business, she would like to use her loan to buy display cases, toys and stationery items.  In the future, she would like to buy her own home since she lives with her mom.  She would also like her children to successfully complete their studies.

loans.use: To buy stationery items and toys

loans.name: Jared

texts.en: In the photo are  Jared M. O. and his wife.  He runs a retail shop to make a living.  He also earns extra income from his rental houses.  His wife has been supporting him in running the business for four years.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been empowered to work hard in his business. He hopes that someday, he will transform his business into a wholesale enterprise.  With the loan of 50,000 Kes, he will stock more cereals for his shop inventory.

loans.use: To add stock of cereals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of inventory

loans.name: Augusto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Augusto; el tiene 32 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con la compra y venta de maíz y también se dedica al negocio de transporte de carga, el tiene un pequeño terreno de cultivo donde cultiva maíz y lo vende en las diferentes ferias que existe, el socio quiere mejorar la tierra de cultivo. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para la tierra de cultivo.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Augusto is a member of the 'Virgen Natividad' community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department. 

Augusto is 32 years old and lives with his common-law wife.  They have 4 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business buying and selling corn.  He is also in the freight transportation business.  Augusto has a small plot of land where he grows corn which he then sells in different markets.  He would like to improve the plot of land where he grows his crops.  He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for his land.  He is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers for the plot of land where he grows his crops

loans.name: Hector Raul

texts.es: El Sr. Héctor Raúl es una persona muy honrada y respetuosa el tiene un negocio de carnicería el cual lo atiende el mismo, para el la mayor satisfacción es poder tener bien surtido para sus clientes, el quiere el préstamo por que necesita surtir mas su carnicería para así poder proporcionar variedad de productos a la hora de comprar la carne ya que asi aumentaría sus ventas y por lo tanto la mayor satisfacción de la gente, el esta casado, su esposa no esta trabajando, tiene 2 hijas las cuales están estudiando el nada mas trabaja en su carnicería, de ahí proporciona el sustento familiar, por eso el quiere y necesita el préstamo, para que en estas fecha a el pueda ver su carnicería completa para asi ofrecerle mas variedad a la clientela .
texts.en:
Héctor Raúl is a very honorable and respectful person.  He has a butcher's business which he works in himself.  His greatest satisfaction is to be able to have a well-stocked business for his customers.  He would like a loan because he needs to stock his butcher's business so that he can provide a variety of products for those who are buying meat since this would allow him to increase his sales and better satisfy his customers.  

Héctor Raúl is married.  His wife does not work.  He has 2 daughters who are studying.  He only works in his butcher's business and it is the only source of support for his family.  He would like this loan and needs it so that he can have a complete butcher's shop and thereby offer more variety to his customers.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Avelina; ella tiene 41 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de maíz, verdura y leña, la socia tiene un pequeño terreno de cultivo donde siembra diferentes verduras como tomate, zapallo y maíz, la socia vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Urubamba, la socia quiere mejorar las tierras de cultivo. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Avelina is a member of the communal bank "VIRGEN NATIVIDAD"; the bank is located in the district of Urubamba which is part of the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco. Avelina is 41 years old; she lives with her partner and has four children. Avelina divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling corn, vegetables, and firewood. She has a small plot of land where she plants different vegetables such as tomato, pumpkin, and corn; she sells her produce in different town fairs that take place in the district of Urubamba. Avelina would like to improve her farmland, and she is asking for a loan in order to be able to buy corn wholesale. She is happy about the loan and is committed to timely repayment.

loans.use: To purchase corn wholesale

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es: Cirila, de 53 años, es una madre de familia noble de condición humilde, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos. Por muchos años, con su canasta en mano recorre las calles y los mercados de su distrito, en su afán de vender golosinas y cigarros, pero hace 10 años que se ha instalado en cerca a un casino, la más concurrida de su distrito. Desde entonces sus ventas han aumentado, trabajando solo por las tardes hasta altas horas de la noche, sin la necesidad de caminar mucho. Se siente tranquila con el negocio que posee, es mucho más reposado al anterior y además le proporciona un poco más de ganancias. Solo que a veces no cuenta con suficiente capital para proveerse de mercadería, ya que para conseguirlo se tiene que ir al mercado central de Lima. En el futuro, lo que más desea es ampliar su negocio con el incremento de diversidad de golosinas. Es su 13avo crédito con MFP y se compromete pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que desea contar con posteriores ayudas, para continuar con su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, piensa comprar galletas, caramelos, cigarros y chocolates en general  para así continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Cirila is 53 years old.  She is the mother of a noble but modest family.  She lives in her own home with her husband and 3 children.  For many years, with her basket in her hand, she has been walking through the streets and markets of her district, selling candies and cigarettes.  Ten years ago she set herself up close to the busiest casino in her district.  Since then, her sales have increased.  She works alone in the afternoons until very late at night and no longer needs to walk much.

Cirila feels relaxed with the business that she now owns as it is much more relaxed than the previous one and it provides her with slightly more income.  The problem is that sometimes she doesn't have enough capital to stock up with merchandise.  To stock up she has to go to the central market in Lima.  In the future, what she would most like is to expand her business by providing a wider range of candies.

This is Cirila's 13th loan with MFP and she pledges to make all her loan repayments on time since she would like access to further loans so that she can continue in her business.  She will use her loan to buy cookies, candies, cigarettes and chocolates so that she can continue in her business.

loans.use: To buy cookies, candies, cigarettes and chocolate

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lourdes; ella tiene 34 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche, menestras, golosinas entre otros, a la vez la se dedica a la crianza de chanchos y al cultivo de verduras, la socia trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo.

La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar su negocio y para la compra de algunas semillas y comida para sus animales (chanchos). 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Lourdes is a member of the communal bank “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; the bank is located in the district of Urubamba which is part of the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco. Lourdes is 34 years old; she lives with her partner and has two children. Lourdes divides her time between her daily household activities with her grocery store business where she sells the common staples such as rice, sugar, mixed vegetables, milk, snacks and others. Together with her husband, she also grows pigs and cultivates vegetables. Lourdes is asking for a loan in order to supply her business as well as to purchase seeds and animal feed. She is happy about the loan and is committed to timely repayment.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and animal feed; to purchase supplies for the grocery store business

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irma; ella tiene 24 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de zapallo y venta de maíz, el zapallo lo vende en el distrito de Calca y el maíz lo vende en la ciudad de Juliaca, la socia tiene pequeños terrenos de cultivo donde siembra maíz y zapallo, la socia quiere tener una tienda para poder vender las verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes para el terreno de cultivo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Irma belongs to the 'Virgen Natividad' community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Irma is 24 years old and single.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling squash and corn.  She sells the squash in Calca district and the corn in the city of Juliaca.  Irma has some small plots of land where she grows corn and squash.  She would like to have a store where she can sell her vegetables.  She is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers for her crops.

Irma is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her crops

loans.name: Duncan

texts.en: Duncan is a member of Faulu Kenya under the 'Amazing Grace' group.  He joined the group so as to easily access loans from Faulu Kenya because the members of the group guarantee each other's loan.  Through Faulu Kenya he has managed to expand his retail shop.  It's two years since he started operating the business and he hopes to expand the business into a wholesale enterprise in the future.  He has requested 30,000 Kes to buy sugar.

loans.use: To buy sugar

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a 28-year-old lady, married and with seven children who are in school.  She is a hard-working lady who does dairy farming for a living.  She has been running the business for over two years.  She is also employed in a hotel.  She aspires to be a well-known farmer in the future.  She has requested 20,000 Kes through 'Ikinu Genesis' group in Faulu Kenya so as to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Cortina es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable ya tiene mas de 20 años atendiendo un despacho contable que ubico en su propio domicilio sus hijos ya están grandes y ya no dependen de su padre económicamente, su esposa su compañera de vida, siempre lo ha apoyado antes ella también trabajaba como empleada pero ya hace unos años dejo de laborar y se dedica a su casa y atender a su marido ella le ayuda en todo lo que puede en la oficina, el crédito lo requiere para mejorar el aspecto de su oficina para tener una buena presentación de la misma.
texts.en: Mr Cortina is a very hard-working and responsible person.  He has been working in his accountancy office, which is located in his own home, for 20 years.  His children are already grown up and no longer depend on their father financially.  His wife, his life companion, has always supported him.  She used to work in his business as an employee but some years ago she stopped working and devoted herself to her home and looking after her husband.  She helps him with everything she can in his office.  He requires this loan to improve the appearance of his office so that it makes a good impression.

loans.use: To buy furniture for his office

loans.name: Javier Agustin

texts.es:
Javier de 35 años, ha sido un padre responsable desde que tuvo a su primer hijo con su esposa que es ama de casa. Ha estado trabajando como fotógrafo en fiestas y eventos ya que su padre le enseño desde que el era pequeño ha tomar fotos. 

Ya tiene 11 años siendo fotógrafo de eventos haciendo contratos para fiestas, eventos de escuelas, bodas, etc.  Tiene su estudio en su casa para hacer la producción de las fotos, retratos. En la actualidad ya tiene una lista de clientes fijos que le piden sus servicios.  Como él vive en una zona periurbana caracterizada porque es una de las más peligrosas de Guayaquil por el índice de delincuencia no puede hacer eficazmente su trabajo ya que él ha comprado cámaras profesionales para su trabajo y los ladrones están pendientes. 

Para seguir realizando su trabajo eficientemente él quiere comprar con el préstamo memorias y macos para sus fotos. Pero con otra parte del dinero quiere comprar cemento, bloques para construir mejor su casa y asegurarla.   Una de sus metas es tener un local para su negocio de fotografía y terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Javier is 35 years old.  He has been a responsible father since he had his first child with his wife, who is a housewife.  He has been working as a photographer at parties and events as his father taught him to take photos from an early age.

Javier has been an events photographer for 11 years, making contracts for parties, school events, weddings, etc.  He has his photography studio in his home where he produces his photos and portraits.  He currently has a list of regular customers who request his services.  As he lives in a peri-urban area which is noted as being one of the most dangerous in Guayaquil, owing to the crime level there, he cannot do his work effectively because he has bought professional cameras for his work and thieves are always hanging around.

To continue doing his work efficiently, he would like to use his loan to buy memory sticks and frames for his photos.  With another part of his money, he would like to buy cement and blocks to better build his house and make it safe.  One of his goals is to have premises for his photography business and to finish building his house.

loans.use: To buy memory sticks and frames

loans.name: Ka-La-Mayre Group

texts.en: Jatu S. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs.  Born in Rubureh village in northern Sierra Leone, she is 32 years of age, married to a teacher and  has three children, two of whom are attending primary school. For five years now, Jatu has been selling firewood. With her share of this loan, she will buy a truckload of firewood to sell.

loans.use: To buys firewood to sell.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.es: L. Sra. Eunice D. L. R. se divorcio del padre D. sus hijos y al quedar soL. decidió poner un negocio D. comida que con el tiempo a progreso hasta llegar a ser un negocio establecido que se dedica a dar servicio en los comedores D. las maquiladoras y a hacer banquetes para reuniones familiares. Lo atienD. su hijo y L. Sra. Eunice y un empleado y requieren D. un baño maría para mantener L. comida caliente y asi economizar en el gas.
texts.en: Eunice D. L. R. is divorced from her children's father.  When she was on her own, she decided to set up a food business.  Over time, she has maD. progress and hers has become an established business which provides meals to canteens in the 'maquiladoras' (foreign-owned assembly plants on the Mexican siD. of the US-Mexico border) and to feasts at family reunions.  Eunice and her child work in the business together with an employee.  They require a bain Marie to keep their food warm and thereby save on gas.

loans.use: To buy utensils for her business (a bain Marie)

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Carmen Rosa; ella tiene 55 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. maíz, verduras, y pasto, ella venD. en el mercado modelo D. Urubamba desD. las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6.00 p.m, la socia quiere tener un local donD. pueda vender las verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa is a member of the “Virgen Natividad” community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Carmen Rosa is 55 years old.  She is married and has 6 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling corn, vegetables and fodder.  She sells her products in the Mercado Modelo, a market, in Urubamba.  She works from 6.00am to 6.00pm.  She would like to have premises from which she can sell her vegetables.  She is requesting this loan to buy vegetables wholesale.

Carmen Rosa is happy to be receiving a loan and she pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy vegetables wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy inventory

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. José; el tiene 19 años de edad y es soltero; el socio se dedica a la agricultura el siembra verdura, maíz entre otros, para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes como por ejemplo en el mercado de Ollantaytambo, Urubamba y Cusco, siendo esta la única actividad que realiza por el momento. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para su negocio como fertilizantes, maíz, semillas entre otros

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Señor José is 19 years old, single and belongs to the communal bank "Virgen Natividad"  The bank is located in the Urubamba district, in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.  He works in agriculture growing vegetables, corn and other things.  He sells to his customers in the markets in Ollantaytambo, Urubamba and Cusco.  This is his only job at the moment.  He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, corn, seeds and other things.  He feels fortunate to receive the loan and is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, corn and seeds

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria; ella tiene 57 años de edad y es casada; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de crianza de animales menores y también vende fruta y verduras en el mercado de Urubamba, la socia cría animales como cuyes, pollos y chanchos y lo vende en las diferentes ferias que hay en el distrito de Urubamba, la socia quiere tener una tienda donde pueda vender las frutas y verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales menores.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the“Virgen Natividad” communal bank.  It is situated in the Urubamba district that belongs to Cusco province in Cusco department.

The member is Maria.  She is 57, married and alternates her daily activities with raising small animals and selling fruit and vegetables in the Urubamba market.   
She raises guinea pigs, chickens and pigs and sells them in various markets that are held in the Urubamba district.  Maria would like to have a store where she can sell fruit and vegetables.   She is requesting the loan to buy small animals.

The member is happy with the loan and promises to make all the payments on time.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to buy small animals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy clothes to stock her business

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan; el tiene 42 años de edad y es casado y tiene 5 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte de carga y a la vez se dedica a la compra y venta de maíz y lo transporta a la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado y algunas provincia de Cusco como Urubamba, Ollantaytambo entre otros, el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para su negocio como fertilizantes, maíz, semillas y para el mantenimiento del carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juan belongs to the “Virgen Natividad” community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Juan is 42 years old.  He is married and has 5 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his cargo transport business.  He also buys and sells corn which he transports to the city of Puerto Maldonado and some provinces of Cusco such as Urubamba and Ollantaytambo.  He works together with his wife.

Juan is requesting this loan to buy supplies for his business such as fertilizer, corn and seeds.  He also needs to pay to have his car serviced.

Juan is happy to receive a loan and he pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy supplies for his business such as fertilizers, corn and seeds and to pay for his car to be serviced

loans.name: Giuliana

texts.es: Giuliana, de 42 años, es una mujer noble y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo. El negocio al que Giuliana se dedica, es la preparación y venta de comida, siendo su punto de ventas en un local alquilado, en las periferias de un mercado muy concurrido de su distrito. Este local esta relativamente cerca a su casa, y en dicho lugar, atienda todos los a sus clientes quienes consumen los variados platillos que ella prepara. Sin embrago este trabajo le demanda mucha fuerza y dedicación, debe levantarse temprano a cocinar en grandes volúmenes y cantidad, proveerse de la mercadería necesaria para preparar éstos alimentos y asegurar darle un buena cogida a sus clientes para que siempre regresen a consumir su comida. Es, así que viene trabajando por 2 años en esta labor, que el es muy rentable.  En adelante, su mayor anhelo, es instalar un restaurante de mariscos y comida marina. Este es su 13avo crédito con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, seguirá accediendo a otros créditos con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su grupo comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará muebles y accesorios de cocina, para su local y así continuar trabajando en su negocio.
texts.en:
Giuliana is 42 years old.  She is a respectable and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home with her husband.  Giuliana's business is preparing and selling food.  She makes her sales from rented premises on the outskirts of a very busy market in her district.  These premises are relatively near to her home and there she serves all her customers who eat the dishes that she prepares.  However, this work demands a lot of strength and dedication.  Giuliana must get up early to cook in large quantities and supply herself with the necessary merchandise to make her meals and guarantee a good welcome for her customers who always return to eat her food.  Giuliana has been working in this business for two years and it is very profitable.  In the future, her greatest wish is to set up a seafood restaurant.

This is Giuliana's 13th loan with MFP and she knows that if she makes her repayments on time she will be able to access further loans much easier and without making problems for her community group.  She will use her loan to buy furniture and cooking accessories for her premises so that she can continue working in her business.

loans.use: To buy furniture and accessories for her premises

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy handicrafts and clothes to sell

loans.name: Urla

texts.es: Urla tiene 41 años, es una madre de familia muy responsable y noble, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos. Después de incursionar en la fabricación de aretes, Urla decidió vender carbón y comida, ya que le resulta más rentable que su anterior negocio. Desde entonces su actividad diaria es muy agitada, comprando los ingredientes necesarios, preparando la comida para 5 personas, a quienes les expende su comida y trabajan en una empresa cercana a su casa. Es por ello, terminada la faena del aliñado, en sus respectivos tapers los transporta, hasta el trabajo de sus comensales. Lleva 6 meses dedicándose a esta labor, por lo que considera que éste trabajo lo realiza dentro de la comodidad de su casa. En adelante, piensa ampliar e instalar un restaurante en su casa, asimismo desea criar cerdos. Es su 13avo crédito con MFP, por lo que se ha comprometido nuevamente en ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas, considerando éste crédito es muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito solicitado, comprará cerdos para criar, asimismo mesas, sillas para que instale formalmente su negocio en su casa.
texts.en:
Urla, age 41, is a very responsible and honest mother.  She lives in her own house with her husband and their four children.  After venturing into making earrings, Urla decided to sell coal and food.  This turned out to be more profitable for her than her previous business.

From then on her daily activity has been very hectic.  She buys the necessary ingredients and prepares food for five people who buy the food from her.  They work at a business that is close to her house.  After she finishes the work of preparing the food and putting it in plastic containers, she transports it to where her diners work.

She has been doing this work for six months.  She does this work from the comfort of her own house. In the future she is thinking of expanding and installing a restaurant in her house.  She also wants to raise pigs.

This is her 13th loan with MFP.  Once again, she pledges to be responsible with her payments.  She considers this loan to be very useful to the progress of her business.  She will use the requested loan to buy pigs to raise.  She will also buy tables and chairs to formally set up her business in her house.

loans.use: To buy tables and chairs in order to set up a food stand at her house and to buy pigs to raise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy inventory

loans.name: Las Palomitas Group

texts.es: María Jesús es presidenta de la Alcancía Comunal “Las Palomitas” en ella participan siete personas muy emprendedoras, tal es el caso de María Jesús quien tiene 39 años de edad el nombre de la alcancía se debe que los integrantes viven en un lugar llamado El Palomar; empezó trabajando en una sala de estimulación temprana lo cual adquirió experiencia al trabajar al cuidado de niñitos, conocida también a esta labor como Madre Guía, su esfuerzo no ha sido en vano actualmente es directora de las guarderías de su zona. Los ingresos que le genera dicho empleo construyó un mini departamento en el terreno que le dio su madre así mismo adquirió un terreno propio. De igual manera apoya a su pareja en los gastos de  servicios básicos y parte de educación a sus hijos aún menores de edad. El préstamo lo invertirá en comprar materiales didácticos y decorativos para ambientar su guardería “Gotitas de Amor” para mejor calidez a los niños. Su sueño próximo es ir construyendo de a poquitos su vivienda.
texts.en:
María Jesús is president of the “Las Palomitas” Communal bank.  Seven very enterprising people participate in the bank.  That is the case with María Jesús, age 39.  The bank got its name because the members live in a place called El Palomar.

She started working in an early childhood development room.  She got work experience taking care of children.  This work is also known as “Madre Guía” (Guiding Mother).  Her effort has not been in vain.  She is currently the director of the daycare centers in the zone.  With the income this employment generated she built a small apartment on the land that her mother gave her.  She also got her own land.  This way she supports her life partner with the basic services' expenses and with part of their children’s education.  The children are still minors.

She will use the loan to buy educational and decorative materials for the atmosphere of her child care center, “Gotitas de Amor” (Little Drops of Love).  She will do this to provide the children with more warmth.

Her next dream is to be building, little by little, her house.

loans.use: To buy educational and decorative materials for the child care center

loans.name: Villasoria

texts.es: Villasoria, D. 55 años, es una madre D. familia entregada a su trabajo y sobre todo muy  noble, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Después D. vender productos nutricionales por muchos años, ha decidido vender jugos a pedido D. sus clientes.  DesD. entonces prepara estratos D. frutas y jugos, negocio que le ha resultado  mucho más dinámico y rentable. Es por ello, que todos los días, acuD. al  mercado muy temprano por la mañana con la finalidad D. abastecerse D. frutas y verduras frescas, es así que lleva 2 años realizando esta labor y lo que considera es que le gusta mucho la interrelación con sus clientes ya que la mantiene entretenida, además D. las ganancias que percibe le hace sentir muy independiente. En adelante, anhela instalar una fuente D. soda acondicionando la parte exterior D. su casa. Es su 2do crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, para no perjudicar a las integrantes D. su banco comunal, al que le tiene mucho aprecio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará otra extractora D. mayor capacidad, para mejorar su atención hacia sus clientes.
texts.en:
Villasoria, age 55, is a mother who is devoted to her work.  Above all, she is very honest.  She lives in her own house with her husband and their two children.

After selling nutritional products for many years, she has decided to sell juices by order from her customers.  Since she maD. this decision, she prepares fruit extracts and juices.  The business has turned out to be much more dynamic and profitable for her.  Every day she goes to the market very early in the morning to stock up on fruits and fresh vegetables.

She has been doing this work for two years.  She really likes the interaction with her customers because it keeps her entertained.  Also, the earnings that she gets make her feel very independent.  Later on she is eager to set up a soda fountain outsiD. of her house.

This is her second loan with MFP.  She pledges to make her payments punctually so that she does not disappoint the members of her communal bank, whom she holds in high regard.  She will use the loan to buy another juice extractor with a bigger capacity in order to improve her customer service.

loans.use: To buy a juice extractor

loans.name: Benigno

texts.es:
El Sr. Benigno P. de 45 años de edad, es soltero, no conoce aun la dicha de tener hijos.
   Don Benigno se dedica a la carpintería hace más de 28 años, aproximadamente desde el año 1.982; el comenzó de ayudante, luego fue ascendiendo por la experiencia que ya adquiría en ese momento, como también su ingreso, y ya le sobraba para poder ahorrar, y así lo hizo hasta que juntó capital como para comprar sus maquinarias y un poco de madera para comenzar a trabajar en forma independiente, después de tantos años de sacrificio, en la actualidad le provee en forma semanal a varios comerciales  de la zona. 
   El utilizaría este crédito en comprar más madera, para satisfacer a aquellos a quienes provee sus mercaderías.
 Desea un país con más oportunidades de trabajo.
texts.en:
Benigno P. is 45 years old.  He is single and still hasn't known the joy of having children.

Benigno has been working as a carpenter for 28 years, since approximately 1982.  He started out as an assistant then started to gain experience and more income.  Eventually he had enough income to make some savings and he saved until he had enough capital to buy some machinery and some wood so that he could start his own business.  After many years of hard work, he currently supplies several salespeople in the area with his products every week.

Benigno will use this loan to buy more wood so that he can satisfy those who he provides his products to.  Benigno would like a country with more work opportunities.

loans.use: To buy wood

loans.name: Maria Del Refugio

texts.es: La. Sra. María del refugio es una persona muy trabajadora pero por cuestión de un accidente ya no pudo trabajar ya que se lastimo la cintura y decidió emprender un negocio en su domicilio en el cual ella no hiciera mucho esfuerzo y decidió poner una venta de platillos en su domicilio y como le a hido funcionando muy bien decidió pedir un préstamo para agrandar su negocio y vio en el crédito la mejor manera de hacerlo ya que los pagos son muy accesibles y asi podrá realizar su proyecto de poner mas variedad de platillos.
texts.en: María del Refugio is a very hard-working person but because of an accident in which she hurt her waist she couldn't work.  She decided to set up a business in her home which wouldn't require too much physical effort and she set up a food sales business.  It has done very well and so she has decided to request a loan to expand her business.  She saw a loan as the best way of achieving her goals as the payments are very affordable and she can use the loan to carry out her project of providing a greater variety of meals.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Mercedes Ivania

texts.es:
Doña Mercedes Ivania de 46 años de edad vive con su esposo que tiene un salario fijo el cual la ayuda con los gastos del hogar y con los compromisos adquiridos ella trabaja como coordinadora de EGB en el Ministerio de educacion devengando un salario mensual desde hace 25 años desempeñandose con mucha responsabilidad. 

Solicita su 11vo. crèdito para pintar y areglar la cocina.  
Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su familia permanezca bien unida y que sus hijos estudien para que sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Mercedes Ivania is 46 years old and lives with her husband, who has a fixed income that helps with household expenses and commitments.  She works as a coordinator of Primary Education in the Ministry of Education, earning a monthly salary for the last 25 years.  She has carried out her work with great responsibility.

She is requesting her 11th loan to paint and fix up her kitchen.  Her biggest dream in life is that her family remains united and that her children study to become good citizens.

loans.use: Painting and plastering the kitchen in her home.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La Sra. Francisca A. de 57 años de edad esta felizmente casada con el Sr. Arselio Fleitas de 69 años de edad. El matrimonio tiene 5 hijos, todos mayores de edad, de los cuales uno también ya esta casado, los demás van a la universidad y trabajan para los gastos universitarios y ayudar en la casa.
Doña Francisca es propietaria de un negocio que consiste en venta de telas, el cual funciona hace 30 años atrás con un ahorro que tenían con su marido, quien en aquel entonces trabajaba para una empresa de la ciudad de Caaguazú. 
Su negocio esta ubicado sobre la avenida principal de la ciudad y es muy conocida por la antigüedad de la misma y por la excelente atención que brinda a sus clientes.
Ella Solicita el crédito para la compra de telas blancas variadas para vestidos de colación, ya que en esta fecha del año tiene mucha demanda. 
Desea que el país mejore y aumente la seguridad y que haya mas trabajo para todos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Francisca A., 57 years old, is happily married to Mr. Arselio Fleitas, 69 years old.  They have 5 children, all adults, one of whom is already married.  The others attend university and work to pay their tuition and help at home.

Francisca is the owner of a fabric store that began 30 years ago with savings from her husband, who at the time worked for a company in the city of Caaguazú.

Her business is located on the city's main street and is well known for having been there a long time and for the excellent service she gives her customers.

She is asking for a loan to buy various kinds of white cloth for graduation party dresses, since it is in high demand this time of year.  She wants the country to improve and become safer, and for there to be more work available for everyone.

loans.use: Purchase of cloth

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her general store

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
Maria Auxiliadora , vive en Zona # 7 en Nueva Guinea con su esposo Francisco Velasquez que trabaja como guarda de seguridad en el hospital  Nueva Guinea desde hace 18 años y ella trabaja como operaria desde hace 22 años ambos son personas humildes y bien responsable con sus compromisos;  tiene 5 hijos , 2 mayores  de edad, todos estudian.

Solicita el tercer crèdito para repellar la paredes de su casa que poco a poco ha ido construyendo  con los crèdito obtenidos por AFODENIC,  

Su  sueño en la vida es mejorar sus condiciones de vida y asi brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Auxiliadora lives in Zone #7 in Nueva Guinea with her husband Francisco Velasquez, who has worked as a security guard at the Nueva Guinea hospital for 18 years.  She has worked as machine operator for 22 years.  They are both humble people who are responsible with their commitments.  She has five children, two of whom are grown and they all attend school.

She is asking for her third loan to plaster the walls of the house that she has slowly been building with the loans she has received from AFODENIC.

Her dream is to improve her living conditions to provide more comfort to her family.

loans.use: Plaster the walls of her home

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Señor Francisco Q. de 49 años de edad esta casado hace 25 años con la Señora Feliciana Colmán de 45 años de edad; el matrimonio tiene cinco hijos, de los cuales 2 viven en el extangero.
El Sr. Francisco se dedica a la compra y venta de mandioca en  hace 8 años. Adquiere los productos de los propios productores y luego los comercializa en el mercado municipal y a comercios de la zona.
Solicita este préstamo para la compra de mandioca en cantidad en la chacra, ya que está llegando fin de año y tiene que prepararse para cumplir con todos sus clientes.
Mas adelante desea iniciar un negocio de venta de productos de consumo ya que tiene clientela formada.
texts.en:
Señor Francisco Q., age 49, has been married for 25 years to Señora Feliciana Colmán, age 45. They have 5 children, 2 of whom live abroad.

For 8 years, Sr. Francisco has been involved with the purchase and sale of cassava. He acquires the product from producers and then markets it in the municipal market and to the area’s businesses.

He is applying for this loan in order to purchase cassava from farms. Since the end of the year is arriving he has to prepare to fulfill orders from all his customers. For the future, he wants to begin a business selling consumer products since he has an established clientele.

loans.use: The purchase of cassava.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda de 45 años de edad, tiene 3 hijas las cuales estudian y trabajan como docente, a la vez comparten con su mamà los gastos familiares del hogar.  Yolanda al igual que sus hijas labora como docente de primaria desde hace 25 años en la escuela Enmanuel Mongalo de donde obtiene sus ingresos mensuales para asumir sus obligaciones, ella esta muy agradecida con el apoyo que le ha brindado Kiva por ser beneficiada anteriormente con este Fondo donde construyó una habitacion.

Ahora solicita su 10mo crèdito para arreglar la cocina de su vivienda.  

Sueña con tener una cocina mas amplia y con mejores  condiciones, que sus hijas sean excelentes profesionales y gozar de salud.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 45 years old and has three daughters who study and work as teachers while sharing the household costs with their mother.  Yolanda has worked as a primary school teacher at Enmanuel Mongalo school for 25 years.  This is where she earns her monthly income to meet her obligations.  She is very thankful for Kiva's support because her previous loans have allowed her to build a house.

She is currently asking for her 10th loan to fix the kitchen in her home.

She dreams of having a large kitchen with better conditions.  Her daughters are excellent professionals who are in good health.

loans.use: Fix up the kitchen in her home

loans.name: Ninfa

texts.es:
La Sra Ninfa de 25 años es casada, su marido, de 27 años se llama Cristian Riveros. Ellos tienen una pequeña hija de 3 años de edad. 
La Sra. Ninfa es propietaria de un negocio, el cual inicio con una plata que tenia ahorrado, fruto de su anterior trabajo en el cual se desempeñaba como secretaria de una prestigiosa empresa de la Argentina. 
Actualmente su negocio tiene 3 años de antigüedad y esta estrategicamente ubicado sobre la avenida principal de la ciudad de Caaguazú.
Solicita el crédito para comprar vestidos de fiesta y gala, pro que se aproximan las fiestas de fin de año y colaciones, ademas ya tiene varios pedidos de los mismos. 
Desea un país que tenga a sus gobernantes comprometidos con la gente. Que haya mas trabajo y oportunidades para las personas y no tengan necesidad de viajar al extranjero para progresar.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ninfa is 25 years old and is married to her 27 year old husband, Cristian Riveros. They have a little 3 year old girl.

Mrs. Ninfa is a business owner; she began her business with some money that she saved from her previous job as a secretary for a prestigious company in Argentina.

At present, her business is 3 years old and is strategically located in the principal avenue of the city of Caaguazú.

Mrs. Ninfa needs the loan to buy dresses for parties and galas since the end of the year is approaching as are its parties and she already has some requests for some dresses.

Mrs. Ninfa wishes that her country have politicians that are committed to the people, that there are more jobs and opportunities for people and that they don’t have to travel abroad to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy dresses.

loans.name: Margarita Elita

texts.es:
Margarita de 46 años, le gusto desde pequeña tener su propio dinero por eso decidió desde los 15 años  ser comerciante y vender ropa a sus amigas y conocidas del sector.  Pero por la faltar de ingresos tuvo que abandonar esa actividad y comenzar a trabajar en una empresa de camarones. 

Hace varios años decidió independizase y comenzar a trabajar en la actividad que siempre le gusto. Viviendo en una zona urbana ha estado trabajando durante todos estos años vendiendo vestidos, camisas, blusas etc. Recorre las calles ofreciendo su ropa desde muy temprano para obtener dinero y poder ayudar a sus 5 hijos en su economía. 

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar con el préstamo ropa para que sus clientes tengan más variedad.  En el futuro quiere Cambiarse de casa para mejorar su estilo de vida y tener un local de ropa.
texts.en:
Margarita is 46 years old. As a little girl she wanted to have her own money and that is why when she was 15 she became a salesperson and sold clothing to her friends and people in her area. However, due to a lack of income she had to leave that job and began to work in a shrimp company.

Some years ago she decided to branch out and begin working in the field that she always liked. Margarita lives in an urban area and has been working all of these years selling dresses, shirts, blouses, etc. She goes street to street selling her clothing from very early in the morning to get enough money to be able to help her 5 children.

To keep her business, Margarita wants to use the loan to buy clothing so that her customers have a greater variety. In the future she wants to move to improve her quality of life and to have a clothing store.

loans.use: To buy clothing.

loans.name: Grace

texts.es:
Grace de 39 años de edad, vive con su marido  y sus dos hijos los cuales estudian, cuenta con la ayuda de su marido para los gastos familiares, ella trabaja para la escuelita el Almendro desde hace 13 años, desempeñandose como docente de primaria de donde recibe sus ingresos mensuales para sus obligaciones ademàs cuentan con una pequeña ferrerteria de la cual obtiene otro ingresos econòmicos  por lo tanto posee capacidad de pago.  

Solicita su quinto crèdito para construir una habitaciòn para su hijo mayor y asi brindarle mayor privacidad ya que la necesit.
Su mayor sueño en la vida es tener abundante salud y trabajo para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Grace is 39 years old, and lives with her husband and two children that are attending school. Her husband helps her with the household expenses and she has worked in a school in Almendro for some 13 years as a primary school teacher. She gets her monthly income to pay for their duties and they also have a small hardware store that they get other income from which means that she has the means to pay for the loan.

This will be Grace’s fifth loan to build a room for her oldest son to give him more privacy since he needs it.

Grace’s biggest wish is to be healthy and have a job to help her family.

loans.use: To build a room.

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.es:
El Señor Saturnino V. F. es soltero y no tiene hijos, desde muy pequeño el se dedico a trabajar, el trabajaba de ayudante de albañil, ayudante en chapería , en todo tipo de trabajo donde podría aprender y ganarse un poco de dinero para poder subsistir ya que sus padres lo abandonaron y lo dejaron a cargo de su abuela que es una persona de edad la cual no puede estar todo el tiempo sobre él, después de mucho tiempo ahorro un poco de dinero y se compro una motocicleta y empezó a trabaja como moto taxista  en la localidad de Ivirgarzama, el tiene una antigüedad de más de 5 años dentro esa institución la cual es muy conocida por el servicio eficaz que brinda tanto la institución como sus afiliados.

Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un préstamo de nuestra institución cuyo destino será la compra de una nueva motocicleta, debido a que la que tiene actualmente ya cumplió su ciclo de trabajo y mejorar el servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá también mejorar sus ingresos consecuente mente mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mr. Saturnino V. F. is single and has no children, he began to work from a very young age, he works as a mason and general bodywork assistant, in any type of work where he can learn and earn a bit of money to be able to live since his parents abandoned him and left him in charge of his grandmother, that is at an age where she cannot be take care of him. After saving for a long time, Mr. Saturnino bought a motorcycle and began to work as a motorcycle taxi driver for Ivirgarzama. He has been working as a motorcycle taxi driver in this company for over 5 years, the company is very well known for its efficient service.

This is Mr. Saturnino’s first loan, it will be used to buy a new motorcycle since the one that he has fulfilled its purpose the new one will allow him to improve his service to his customers as well as his income and quality of life.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for his job as a motorcycle taxi driver.

loans.name: Edelmira Del Socorro

texts.es:
Edelmira de 39 años de edad, tiene una hija la cual estudia su secundaria, la Sra. U. trabaja para el ministerio de educaciòn desde hace 18 años desempeñandose como docente de primaria con gran responsabilidad y enpeño.

Solicita su noveno crèdito para invertirlo en compra de  materiales de construcciòn para construir una tapia alrededor de su vivienda, de esta manera brindar mayor seguridad a sus bienes y aumentar el valor comercial de su vivienda.  

Su mayor sueño es poder llegar acondicionar lo mejor posible su vivienda y brindarle mayor comodidad a su hija quien es la heredera de sus bienes.
texts.en: Edelmira is 39 years old and she has a daughter in high school. Mrs. U. has worked for the Ministry of Education for some 18 years working as a primary school teacher which she has done with great responsibility and effort. This will be her ninth loan and it will be used to buy construction materials to build a wall around her home to have more security and to increase her properties’ commercial value. Her biggest dream is to be able to prepare her home and to give wellbeing comfort for her daughter who is the heir to her estate.

loans.use: To build a wall.

loans.name: Maritza Asucena

texts.es:
Maritza vive en la zona # 8 en Nueva Guinea con su familia compuesta por 2 niñas y su esposo; ella labora como docente de primaria en la zona Urbana de Nueva Guinea desde hace 10 años, sus hijas actualmente estudian y su esposo trabaja como comerciante de ganado el cual apoya con los gastos familiares y con los compromisos adquiridos, ya que son una familia bien unida y con mucho deseos de superacion, agradece grandemente el apoyo que ha recibido de Kiva ya que anteriormente fue beneficiada donde aprovechó para construir una habitacion. 

Esta vez solicita su tercer crèdito para invertirlo en compras de materiales de construccion y de esta manera ir mejorando poco a poco su vivienda, es una señora muy alegre y muy servicial , ha demostrado puntualidad y capacidad de pago.  

Su mayor sueño en  vida es mejorar sus condiciones de vida y que sus hijas se preparen para que sean personas de bien.  
 Subscribe
texts.en:
Martiza lives in the #8 area in the Nueva Guinea with her family which is made up of 2 girls and her husband. She works as a primary school teacher in the Urban area of Nueva Guinea for some 10 years. Maritza’s daughters attend school and her husband works as a cattle trader and with his earnings they are able to meet the families’ expenses and the obligations that they have since they are a very united family and have many dreams of getting ahead in life. She is grateful for the support she has received from Kiva since she has had loans previously and she was able to build a room.

This is Maritza’s third loan and it will be used to buy construction materials so that they can improve the home little by little. She is a very happy and helpful person, as well as punctual and has shown to be able to meet her payments.

Martiza’s biggest wish to improve her quality of life and that her daughters get an education and be respectable members of society.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Bendiciones De Dios 1, 2, 3 Group

texts.en:
Sylvenia is the coordinator of the group 'Bendiciones D. Dios' 1, 2 & 3 (God Blessing), a group of Haitian immigrants living in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and the tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity that can't be counted on. She lives in a modest home with her husband and two children. She says that her most difficult challenge is the divorce process she is facing right now and the effect on their children. In the meantime, she plans to continue to enjoy doing business.

Sylvenia is excited to be taking out her seventh loan with Esperanza after having repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for more than nine years, starting with her own resources when she was living in Haiti. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying bed cloths, curtains, clothing, etc. Sylvenia will re-invest the profits in her business. She dreams of building her own house.

This Esperanza associate began with us because her business needed capital to grow, and her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti.

loans.use: To buy clothing and bed cloths

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase a share on a fixed route taxi line

loans.name: Evelin Rosario

texts.es:
La profesora Evelin  de 32 años de edad, tiene una hija que aun estudia su primaria, labora como docente de primaria desde hace 13 años, tiene una hija la cual estudia su primaria, su esposo labora como albañil, ambos comparten con los gastos familiares y son personas de bien.  

Solicita su sexto crèdito con AFODENIC mediante el Apoyo de Kiva para  construir una habitaciòn y mejorar las condiciones y por ende tener mayor privacidad.  

Su sueño es que su familia permanezca  bien unida, estar bien con Dios y que su hija siga estudienado para que sea una mujer de Bien.
texts.en:
The teacher Evelin is 32 years old; she has a daughter that is still in primary school. Evelin has worked as a primary school teacher for over 13 years. Her husband works as a mason and both share in the household expenses and are good people.

Evelin is asking for her sixth loan with AFODENIC (Kiva’s field partner) and with Kiva’s support to build a room and improve her living conditions and as a result have more privacy.

Evelin’s dream is for her family to keep being united and to be well with God and that her daughter keeps studying so she can be a respectable member of society.

loans.use: To build a room.

loans.name: Narcisa Del Jesus

texts.es:
Narcisa de 50 años,  siempre le gusto coser y confeccionar ropa pero como no tenía mucha experiencia decidió inscribirse en una institución que enseñan manualidades. Poco a poco y con la experiencia que obtuvo pudo conseguir una cartera de clientes. 

Con la dedicación que utilizo para que su negocio creciera consiguió  tener una clientela fija. En la actualidad trabaja  desde las 09h00am en su casa donde ubico su taller de costura y confección debido a la falta de dinero hasta las 17h00pm. Viviendo en una zona periurbana caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas está siendo conocida como confeccionista.  

Ella tiene muchas aspiración para su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo telas, hilos, accesorios para confeccionar mas ropa. En el futuro quiere incrementar el taller para poder dar trabajo a otras personas.
texts.en:
Narcisa is 50 years old she has always liked sewing and making clothing but since she didn’t have much experience, she decided to take courses in a place where they teach crafts. Little by little and with the experience she gained she was able to have a list of customers.

With the dedication that she had to set up her business and to keep it growing she was able to get a steady customer base. At present, Narcisa works from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. in her home where she set up her dressmaking shop due to her lack of money. She lives in a semi urban area that is well-known for its dirt paths and mountains. Narcisa is becoming recognized as a ready-made clothier.

Narcisa has many expectations for her business which is why she wants the loan to buy fabrics, threads, and accessories to make more clothing. In the future, she would like to expand her workshop to be able to give jobs to other people.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread.

loans.name: Concepcion Maria

texts.es:
Concepcion Maria de 32 años de edad, vive con su hija que estudia y su esposo el cual trabaja como taxista ambos comparten con los compromisos adquiridos en la unidad familiar,  es importante mencionar que esta clienta ha demostrado  ser una cliente con mucha puntualidad y voluntad de pago en sus creditos anteriores, ella trabaja como docente de primaria y secundaria en la Escuela Francisco Aaron Joce desde hace 12 años en la colonia Naciones Unidas a  32 km de Nueva Guinea.

Solicita su septimo crèdito para construir una habitaciòn mas amplia y con mejores condiciones como todo persona lo desea.

Su sueño es que su hija llegue hacer una excelente profesional y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Concepción Maria is 32 years old.  She lives with her daughter who is studying and her husband who works as a taxi driver.  They both share in their family commitments.  It is important to mention that this client, through her previous loans, has shown herself to be very punctual and keen to make her repayments.  She has worked as a primary and secondary school teacher in Francisco Aaron Joce School for 12 years, in Naciones Unidas neighborhood, 32km from Nueva Guinea.

This is Concepción Maria's seventh loan.  She will use it to build a bigger room, with better conditions as everybody desires.  Her dream is for her daughter to become an excellent professional and to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Oscar Ubaldo

texts.es: El señor Oscar vive en alquiler con sus tres hijos quien solo dos dependen de el. El señor se dedica a la venta de libros ya bastante tiempo quien día a día trabaja muy duro para que sus hijos tengan todo lo necesario, el va promocionando colegio por colegio los libros que vende, le va muy bien en la venta de libros también  deja a crédito y mejor si los vende al contado, solicito el crédito para comprar mas libros ya que tiene pedidos por los colegios. Es así como el trabaja y dio gracias a emprender y kiva por darle la mano ya que es el primer crédito que tiene.
texts.en: Mr. Oscar lives in a rental home with three children of which only two depend on him financially. He works selling books, which he has done for a long time, and everyday works very hard to make sure that his children have everything they need. Mr. Oscar goes school to school with his books and he does very well selling the books, he sells some of them on credit but he prefers to get the money upfront. He needs the loan to buy more books since he has orders from some schools. This is how Mr. Oscar works and is grateful to Emprender (Kiva’s field partner) and Kiva for giving him a hand since this will be his first loan.

loans.use: To buy books.

loans.name: Jessica Virginia

texts.es:
Jessica de 33 años, hace 5 años atrás ella tuvo que comenzar a conseguir dinero para poder mantener a sus tres hijos de 16, 10, y 8 años de edad. Inicio con las  ventas productos Yanbal (empresa que ofrece a mujeres emprendedoras comenzar con sus ventas independientes por catalogo). 

Por la buena administración que le ha dado a su capital de trabajo ahora es conocida por el sector donde vive en el Paraíso de Guayaquil una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas. Hace por semana pedidos para que les lleguen los productos que les piden sus clientes. Trabaja desde las 08h00am recorriendo y visitando a sus conocidos y clientes fieles para que compren los productos. 

Ella quiere seguir trabajando surtiendo su mercadería comprando con el préstamo perfumes, cremas, tratamientos. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Jessica is 33 years old.  Five years ago she had to start working to earn money so that she could support her three children aged 16, 10 and 8.  She started selling Yanbal products.  Yanbal is a company that offers enterprising women the chance to begin making their own independent catalog sales.

Through her good management of her working capital, Jessica is now well-known in her neighborhood in Paraíso de Guayaquil.  This is an area which is noted for its dirt roads and mountains.  She makes weekly orders for the products that her customers request.  She works from 8.00am visiting her acquaintances and loyal customers so that they can buy her products.

Jessica would like to continue working, stocking up with merchandise and buying perfumes, creams and treatments with her loan.  In the future, she would like to finish building her house.

loans.use: To buy perfume, creams and treatments

loans.name: Felicia

texts.es:
La Sra R. A. Felicia llego el año 2002  del departamento de Potosi,  a la provincia Chayanta  al Tropico de Cochabamba con la esperanza  de buscar mayores oportunidades de vida, en los primeros  años trabajo como ayudante  de cocina, posteriormente se concubino y tiene  dos hijos  y poco a poco fue adquiriendo  un puesto de venta de comida,  su sueño es hacer estudiar a sus hijos, comprarse una vivienda, actualmente vive en alquiler.
   
La Sra. Felicia se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace 2 años y como su actividad está creciendo y ahora cuenta con más clientes es que la Sra. Felicia está solicitando un crédito  para poder  hacer crecer su negocio y así poder tener la casita de sus sueños.
texts.en:
Felicia A. R. arrived in Potosi department, in Chayanta province, in Tropico de Cochabamba in 2002 seeking better opportunities in life.  For the first few years she worked as a kitchen assistant.  She then became involved with someone and they had two children.  She gradually acquired her own food sales stall.  Her dream is to provide her children with an education and buy a house as she currently rents.

Felicia has been selling food for 2 years.  Her business has been growing and she now has more customers.  Felicia is requesting a loan so that she can grow her business and thereby be able to have the little house of her dreams.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Nicolas De Tolentin

texts.es:
Don Nicolas  de 52 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos los cuales estudian y el mayor trabaja, su esposa lo apoya realizando los quehaceres del hogar y cuidando  de sus hijos, él trabaja como Guarda de seguiridad de  la Universidad desde hace 4 años siendo este su mayor fuente de ingresos, es una persona muy dedicada y esforzada esta pendiente de sus obligaciones mismas que asume con responsabilidad.  

Le agradece a Kiva por el apoyo recibido, ya que fue beneficiado anteriormente con un credito el cual lo cancelo en tiempo y forma, solicita su segundo crèdito, para repellar una habitaciòn y hecharle el piso a su vivienda para no perder el hilo de la construccion de la misma.   

Su mayor sueño en la vida es continuar mejorando su vivienda hasta llegar a concluirla, mantener estabilidad laboral y que su familia permanezca en buenos caminos.
texts.en:
Nicolas is 52 years old and has 3 children who are all students and the oldest works; his wife helps him by taking care of their home and their kids.  He has worked as a security guard at the Uraccan for the last 4 years; this is his primary source of income.  He is a very dedicated person who works hard; he is very aware of his responsibilities and takes pride in fulfilling them.

He is grateful to Kiva for the support he is receiving through this loan; he was the beneficiary of a prior loan from Kiva which he paid back on time.  He is seeking his second loan to plaster the walls of his home and to put down a floor to finish parts of the interior.

His dream is to continue improving his home until he can finish it, to have stable employment, and to have his family follow the right paths in life.

loans.use: Plaster the walls of his home and put in a floor for the house

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen  de 39 años  de edad, vive con su hija y su compañero de vida quien labora como albañil él le ayuda con los gastos del Hogar, Carmen labora de conserje en en INATEC NUEVA GUINEA desde hace 18 años, es una mujer muy responsable, honesta, trabajadora y bien querida por sus compañeros de trabajo y amigos.

Solicita financiamiento con el apoyo de  kiva para mejorar la infraestructura de su cocina  como paredes y piso.  

Sueña tener un porvenir mejor y una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Carmen is 39 years old, she lives with her daughter and life partner who works as a mason, and he also helps her with the household expenses. Carmen has worked as a porter in the INATEC NUEVA GUINEA for over 18 years; she is a responsible, honest, hardworking woman who is beloved by her workmates and friends.

Carmen needs the loan with Kiva’s support to improve the infrastructure of her kitchen such as the walls and floor.

She wishes to have a better life and a dignified home.

loans.use: To improve her kitchen.

loans.name: Roger Jaime

texts.es: El Sr. Roger tiene como actividad la venta de comida atendiendo con el servicio de comida y bebida a una institución de la ciudad, esta actividad la desarrolla juntamente con su mamá, esta actividad se constituye en su principal fuente de ingreso para el y su familia. El Sr.  Roger es una persona joven con muchas ganas de triunfar en la vida, siempre mejorando su negocio, , en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de una heladera, un microondas y un kit completo de menaje de cocina para así de esta manera brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mr. Roger sells food and beverages in a company in the city, he does the job with his mother and the work is the main source of income for him and his family. Mr. Roger is a young person and wishes to get ahead in life by always improving his business. At this time he needs the loan to buy a freezer, a microwave oven and a complete kit of cooking tools to give better service to his customers. Mr. Roger is very grateful to the institution for the support given to him.

loans.use: To buy a freezer and microwave oven.

loans.name: Sugey Del Carmen

texts.es:
Sugey tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos, actualmente vive con sus padres en la zona # 6 de Nueva Guinea y se  apoyan ambos con los gastos familares, trabaja como docente de la Escuela Experimental Jan Amos Comenius desde hace 9 años, por las tardes cuando regresa de dar clase se dedica a terminar los quehaceres del hogar y despues a planear la clase para luego impartirselas el dia siguientes a sus alumnos, Sugey es una mujer profesional responsable, honesta, trabajadora, logra con exito lo que se propone para su propio bien y el de su familia. 

Esta muy agradecida con Kiva por el apyo ya que gracias a esto ha venido arreglando su vivienda.  Por lo que solicita este nuevo credito para reparaciòn de la misma ya que necesita algunos arreglos como cambiar el zinc y hecharle el piso a una habitaciòn. 

Sueña con seguir estudiando, tener salud, tener una casa bonita con todas las condiciones y tener estabilidad laboral para así ayudar a su familia ya son de escasos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Sugey is 28 years old, is single and has no children, at this time she lives with her parents in the #6 area of Nueva Guinea and they help each other with the family expenses. Sugey has worked as a teacher at the Experimental School Jan Amos Comenius for some 9 years; in the afternoons when she arrives from her job she finishes the household jobs and later makes the teaching plan for her class the next day. Sugey is a responsible professional woman, honest, hardworking and achieves with success what she sets out to do for her wellbeing and that of her family.
Sugey is very grateful to Kiva for the support and thanks to the loans she has been able to make improvements in her home. She needs the new loan to make some repairs for her home such as changing the zinc and replacing the floor of a room.
Sugey dreams of continuing her education, being healthy and having a beautiful home with all of its amenities and to have a steady workplace to be able to help her family since they have little economic resources.

loans.use: To make improvements on a home.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
El señor Simón R. T. tiene 46 años casado con la Señora Leónidas Hinojosa Morales de R. mas de 9 años, tienen 3 hijos menores dependientes, viven en sector de Aguirre que está ubicado a 42 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba.

El Sr Simón es agricultor produce papa, haba y también viaja a Yapacani llevando los productos agrícolas a vender juntamente con la esposa, es una persona humilde pero trabajador, él necesita dinero para comprar insumos agrícolas abono orgánico, semilla de papa, para ello es muy difícil acudir a los Bancos de la ciudad que les piden muchos requisitos, Se tuvo la iniciativa de ir a esa zona y otorgar crédito, el Sr. Simón está muy contento de haber conseguido un crédito, ahora va poder comprar los insumos agrícolas así va tener más ingresos económicos para hacer estudiar a sus 3 hijos menores y ahora para mejor la vivienda que habita.
texts.en:
Mr. Simón R. T. is 46 years old and has been married to Mrs. Leónidas Hinojosa Morales de R. for over 9 years. Together they have 3 underage children, and live in the Aguirre area that is located 42 km from the city of Cochabamba.

Mr. Simón is a farmer and grows potatoes and haba beans, he also goes to Yapacani and takes his agricultural products to sell with his wife. He is a very humble but hardworking person, Mr. Simón needs the money to buy items for his crops such as organic manure and potato seeds, it is very difficult to go the banks in the city since they have too many requirements which is why he chose to take the initiative to go to that area and get the loan. Mr. Simón is very happy to have received the loan and he will now be able to buy his agricultural products so that he can have more income to send his 3 underage children to school and to improve the home which he inhabits.

loans.use: To buy agricultural products.

loans.name: Angela Maritza

texts.es:
Angela Maritza de 41 años de edad  trabaja como Afanadora del Hospital Jacinto Hernández, desde hace 24 años, tiene 2 hijos: la mayor de 17 esta empezando sus estudios universitarios y el menor de 12 años estudia 1er año de Secundaria, su esposo trabaja como Auxiliar de Mantenimiento en el Hospital, ambos comparten los gastos del hogar, doña Angela es una mujer responsable, honesta, trabajadora y muy humilde, vive en la zona # 2 de Nueva Guinea donde la población cada dia crece mas, ella se siente agradecida con el apoyo de kiva ya que anteriormente pudo construir su Pantri y compró electrodomesticos gracias a este Financiador.

Por tanto ahora solicita credito  para ampliaciòn de cocina  pues la que tiene es muy pequeña y necesita mayor comodidad. 

Su sueño es tener una vivienda digna donde su familia se desarrollen en un ambiente sano y agradable.
texts.en:
Angela Maritza is 41 years old.  She has been working as a cleaner at the Jacinto Hernández Hospital for 24 years.  She has two children: the eldest is 17 and is beginning his university studies and the youngest is 12 and in the first year of his secondary education.  Her husband works as a maintenance assistant at the Hospital.  They both share the household expenses.
