Angela is a responsible, honest, hard-working and very humble woman.  She lives in area # 2 of Nueva Guinea where the population is growing.  She feels grateful for the support of Kiva since she has been able to build her pantry and bought domestic electrical appliances thanks to her loans.

She is requesting this loan to extend her kitchen since the one she has is very small and she needs more comfort.

Her dream is to have a decent home where her family can live in a safe and pleasant atmosphere.

loans.use: To finish extending her kitchen

loans.name: Marina Isabel

texts.es:
Marina, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, pupusas y posee además una tienda, su edad es de 31 años, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, residen en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, tiene 5 años de dedicarse a la venta, aprendió a hacer pupusas y tortillas porque su madre le enseño.
Ella actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de bebida, maíz y productos para preparar pupusas, este préstamo le dará la oportunidad de adquirir todo lo necesario para producir su venta y continuar generando ingresos para su hogar.
Su Objetivo es seguir en el comercio y atender de una mejor manera a los clientes, aumentar poco a poco su producción y velar por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Marina sells tortillas, pupusas (a typical Salvadoran dish made with corn or rice and mixed with pork rind, cheese and beans in a tortilla) and has a small store. She is 31 years old and lives with her husband and children; they live in Jiquilisco department of Usulután. Marina has sold her items for some 5 years; she learned to make pupusas and tortillas from her mother.

Marina needs the loan to buy beverages, corn and products to prepare pupusas, the loan will give her the opportunity to get everything necessary to make the products in her home and to keep earning income for her home.

Marina’s goal is to keep selling food products and to serve her customers in better ways, to increase little by little her production and to watch over the wellbeing of her family.

loans.use: To buy beverages, corn and products to prepare pupusas.

loans.name: Cecibel Del Rosario

texts.es:
Cecibel de 41 años, no está casada pero si tiene dos hijos. Para tener una actividad económica y no quedarse sola ella acepto la propuesta que le hizo una amiga en donde ella seria vendedora de productos Yanbal (empresa que ofrece a mujeres emprendedoras comenzar con sus ventas independientes). 

En la actualidad tiene 5 años  realizando su trabajo sola recorriendo las calles. Trabaja desde muy temprano ofreciendo los productos a sus vecinos y amigos, vende perfumes, cremas, desodorantes a un valor muy económico. Ella tiene pensado seguir trabajando para asegurar su vejez. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar productos Yanbal como perfumes, cremas, desodorantes. En el futuro quiere una actividad económica que no tenga que caminar mucho, por eso quiere tener una papelería y ya ha comenzado a comprar una vitina y cuadernos (aparece en la foto).
texts.en: Cecibel is 41 years old, isn't married and has two children. In order to make a living and not be alone she agreed to a friend's suggestion to start selling Yanbal-brand products (a business that lets enterprising women sell its products independently). She currently has five years' experience selling the products on the street.  She works from early in the morning offering the items to her friends and neighbors, selling perfume, lotions and deodorants at a good value. She plans to keep working to secure her retirement. With the loan, she wants to purchase Yanbal products such as perfumes, lotions and deodorants. In the future, she wants a job in which she doesn't have to walk as much, so she wants to have a stationery store and has already started buying a display case and notebooks (items that appear in the photo).

loans.use: Purchase perfumes and lotions

loans.name: Genesis 1 , 2 Group

texts.en:
Clara is the coordinator of her group, 'Genesis' 1 & 2. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and four children. She enjoys reading; in her free time, this is her hobby. She says that her most difficult challenge is to educate her children.

Clara is excited to be taking her second loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for 8 month. She was starting to use her savings to run her 'Comedor' (small restaurant in the neighborhood, especially for lunch). After starting, she heard about Esperanza´s loans and decided to be part of the program. She plans to use this new loan to invest in her business by buying a bag of rice, 10 plastic chairs, and 3 tables. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business and she is dreaming of having her own restaurant in the town. 

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water (none of which is potable).

loans.use: to buy a bag of rice, 10 plastic chairs and 3 tables

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La Sra. Nancy I. V., es una persona de 31 años de edad, casada, tienen dos hijos pequeños, es profesora en el área rural, enseña en una escuela primaria de Tiraque, Escuela Fé y Alegría, ella trabaja en esa localidad distante a 65 kilòmetros de la ciudad.  Su esposo es la persona que maneja el taxi que es fuente de ingreso familiar, hacen transporte de pasajeros en la ciudad, sólo por la tarde, su vehiculo trabaja con gasolina pero gasta mucho en combustible por esa razon necesita realizar una instalacion de gas para poder economizar en combustible. 

En Cochabamba, viven en la casa de los padres, quieren crecer en su economía para hacer su casa propia, mejorando de esta manera sus condiciones de vida.  Necesita capital de inversión para comprar un tanque de gas para el taxi, asimismo un nuevo motor porque el actual le robaron.
texts.en: Nancy is 31 years old, married and has two small children. She is an elementary school teacher in the rural area of Tiraque, Escuela Fé and Alegría, about 65 kilometers from the city. Her husband drives a taxi, which is the family's main source of income, transporting passengers in the city only during the afternoons. The vehicle runs on gas, which is very expensive, so they want to make the car more efficient and economical. They live in her parents' home in Cochabamba, Bolivia, where they want to grow their finances so they can have a home of their own and improve their quality of life. Nancy is requesting the loan to purchase a new gas tank for the taxi as well as a new motor because the old one was stolen.

loans.use: Purchase a gas tank and motor

loans.name: Arlen Patricia

texts.es: Arlen Patricia tiene 31 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo. La mayoría de sus clientes siempre le solicitan una gran variedad de productos. Inicio como empleada de una empresa fue con el paso del tiempo que ella decidió hacerse cargo de su propio negocio. el motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de calzado, cosméticos, ropa y otros productos. Sueña con mejorar su habitación y su nivel de vida.
texts.en: Arlen Patricia is 31 years old. She makes a living selling general merchandise. She has had her business for more than three years. She has one young son under her care. The majority of her customers always request a wide variety of products. Arlen started out working for a company but with the passage of time she decided to start her own business. She is requesting the loan to purchase footwear, cosmetics, clothing and other products. Her dream is to improve her home and her quality of life.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Nora Maria

texts.es: Nora Maria tiene 23 años, su actividad es la venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio. Ella inicio este negocio por sus hermanas que anteriormente trabajaban en este tipo de actividad con el paso del tiempo fue le lograron enseñar a Nora este tipo de trabajo digno. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y disfruta de esta actividad. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima lápiz labial, cremas, perfumes, entre otras cosas. Sueña con incrementar su negocio.
texts.en: Nora Maria is 23.  She has been selling cosmetics for the last 4 years.  She started this business with her sisters, who used to work in this field and who taught Nora this trade.  She is hardworking and enjoys her work.  She will use the loan to buy stock, including lipstick, creams, and perfumes.  She wants to increase her business.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Marlene Yesenia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Virgen De Monserrate.

Aquí conocimos a Marlene, ella tiene 32 años de edad, está soltera y vive en la casa de sus padres en la cual vive en compañía  de tres hermanos. Estudia párvulo en una Universidad los días sabados y domingos. Trabaja en una guardería de lunes a viernes.

Además de esto se dedica a elaborar manualidades,  adornos y sorpresas  navideñas, estos productos los elabora a base de fomix, telas, esponja y otros productos, ella entrega pedidos de sus productos a la organización Plan Internacional y a personas en particulares. Trabaja de lunes a sábado en las noches ya que en las mañanas trabaja en la guardería.

Con este crédito  va a  comprar esponjas, pinturas, escarchas, fomix y otros materiales necesarios para elaborar sus productos. Es fundadora del Banco Comunal  y le gusta por la ayuda que brindan a personas como ella para sacar sus negocios adelante. Sus sueños son incorporarse, obtener un nombramiento de maestra y tener su propia empresa.
texts.en:
The members of the community bank "Virgen de Monserrate" meet every two weeks in the city of Portoviejo, capital of Manabi which has been known for many years as the city of the royal tamarinds. 

Here we met Marlene who is 32 years old. She is single and lives at her parents' house with her three siblings. She studies child care at a university on Saturdays and Sundays and works at a nursery from Monday to Friday. 

She also does crafts and makes Christmas decorations and surprises. She makes these products using craft foam, fabric, sponges and other products. She delivers the orders for her products at the organization "Plan Internacional" and to individuals. She works from Monday to Saturday in the evenings since she works at the nursery in the morning. 

With this loan she will buy sponges, paints, glitter, craft foam and other materials necessary to make her products. She is a founding member of the community bank and she likes it because of the help they provide to people like her to help their businesses succeed. Her dreams are to incorporate, obtain an appointment as a teacher and to have her own company.

loans.use: Buy sponges, paints, glitter, craft foam, etc.

loans.name: Otto

texts.es:
Otto B. V.  es un vendedor de lotería muy popular en su comunidad, Guaitil de Guancaste.
El es conocido por ser una persona muy luchadora por que apesar de sus limitaciones es el que mantiene su familia. Su intensión es crear  un capital de trabajo que le permita comprar inventario de Loteria para tener un negocio más sostenible.  Con esto mejorara sus ingresos y podrá comprar los materiales para que su hermana vaya al colegio.
El es Socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal Guaitil, una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en: Otto B. Villafuer is a popular lottery seller in his community, Guaitil de Guancaste. He is known for being a striving person because in spite of his limitations he supports his family. His intention is to create working capital that will allow him to buy lottery inventory in order to have a more sustainable business. This will allow him to improve his income and he will be able to buy the materials so that his sister can go to school. He is a member of "Empresa de Credito Comunal Guaitil" one of the 100 member organizations of field partner EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: Purchase inventory.

loans.name: Berbelita

texts.es: La  señora Berbelita, se dedica a la venta de pan ,tiene 23 años.  Vive en la zona del plan 3000; ella vende los seis días a la semana, su venta Empieza a las 6 de la mañana y acaba alas 8 Pm. Se levanta desde muy temprano para preparar la masa, Es Clienta antigua, anteriormente trabajo con grupos, con los prestamos  se logro su comprar su horno y a si decidió sacar un crédito individual. Tiene una hijita Por quien Trabajar y desea que su negocio sea mas productivo en el transcurrir del tiempo, con el dinero del crédito comprara insumos es ingredientes para la elaboración de los panes, es un persona y trabajadora y responsable con el pago de sus cuotas, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Berbelita sells bread. She is 23 years old and lives in the area "Plan 3000". She sells bread six days a week and starts selling at 6:00 a.m. and ends at 8:00 p.m. She gets up early to make the dough. She is an old client as she previously worked with other groups. With her other loans she was able to buy her oven and has now decided to obtain an individual loan. She has a small daughter for whom she works and she wants her business to be more productive as time goes by. She will use this loan to buy ingredients to make bread. She is a hard working person and responsible in making her payments. She is thankful to this institution for the help it has provided to her.

loans.use: Purchase supplies such as flour and sugar.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 41 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Hace más de 9 años que tiene este negocio, inicio con ciertos ahorros que y arduo trabajo pues siempre le ha gustado ser una mujer muy independiente. En donde la mayoría de sus clientes siempre le solicitan una gran variedad de productos, por lo que se siente muy agradecida con los financiamientos que se le han otorgado. Este crédito es para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan y detergentes ya que se acerca una buena temporada.
texts.en: Mercedes is 41.  She has had a general store for the last nine years.  She started this business with some savings and lots of hard graft, since she has always liked to be a very independent woman.  Her clients ask for a wide range of products, which is why she feels very grateful for the funding she has received.  She will use this loan to buy basic goods, sweets, soft drinks, bread, and detergents to have more stock for this good time of year for sales.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Ana Monserrate

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Virgen De Monserrate.

Encontramos a la señora Ana, tiene 60 años de edad, está casada y tiene siete hijos, 5 de ellos ya son mayores de edad y tiene dos de 7 y 5 años que estudian en la escuela, en la actualidad cuatro de sus hijos viven con ella. Su marido hace fletes en un carro de su propiedad. Está desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque en las reuniones aprende mucho.

Tiene un pequeño taller de costura donde hace muchos años se dedica a coser ropa  todo tipo, trabaja a base de pedidos de personas particulares y también elabora uniformes para instituciones, escuelas y colegios de la localidad. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6am hasta las 22h00. Además de esto también fabrica chifles los mismos que los vende a personas que le piden estos productos.

Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas y otros materiales para la costura. Sus sueños son tener un taller más grande y un almacén en el centro de la ciudad donde  pueda vender sus obras.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days, the members of the Virgen De Monserrate community bank meet in the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of regal tamarind trees.

Ana, 60, is married and has seven children.  Five of these are grown up, but she has two who are 7 and 5 years old respectively and who are studying in school.  Four of her children currently live with her.  Her husband earns his living by carrying freight in his own vehicle. She has been a member of the community bank from the start and enjoys its meetings, since she learns so much from them. 

She has a small clothing workshop, where for many years she has made different kinds of clothes to order, as well as uniforms for local institutions, schools, and colleges.  She works every day from 6 am to 10 pm.  She also makes chips to order.

Ana will use this new loan to buy fabric and other sewing materials.  She would like to have a bigger workshop and a store in the center of town to sell her work.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, buttons, clasps, etc.

loans.name: Luzmilda

texts.es:
Luzmilda  V. V.  es conocida por hacer las mejores rosquillas (galletas de Maiz) de Guaitil en Guanacaste.
Ella ha participado en diferentes  ferias de comida debido a sus sabrosas rosquillas, pero en este momento  necesita un préstamo de ₡500 000 (quinientos mil colones) para la compra de materiales e ingredientes de producción, donde va a hacer  y vender su producto, Con el fin de  hacer de sus galletas un negocio sostenible que le brinde  bienestar a su Familia.
Ella es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal Guaitil, una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en: Luzmilda  V. V. is known for making the best roquillas (corn pastries similar to donuts) in Guaitil, Guanacaste. She has participated in different food fairs due to her delicious rosquillas, but at this moment she needs a loan of 500,000 colones ($1,000 USD) to buy materials and ingredients for baking and selling her product. She wants to make her pastry business sustainable and provide well-being for her family. She's a member of the Empresa de Crédito Comunal Guaitil (Communal Credit Company Guaitil), one of the 100 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: Purchase of materials

loans.name: Emma Elizabeth

texts.es: La señora Emma tiene su negocio que es un cafetín, hace más de 40 años que tiene este negocio, con mucho esfuerzo y buena administración ha mantenido. Ella es una persona muy luchadora y disfruta de su actividad esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, pues se siente muy contenta ya que se acerca una buena temporada. El financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como golosinas, refrescos, pan, gaseosas, juegos, entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Emma has had her food stand business for more than 40 years, and she's maintained it with hard work and good administration. She's a tenacious person who enjoys her work. This isn't the first time she's taken out a loan, and she feels very happy because a good season is coming. The loan is for the purchase of merchandise such as candy, sodas, bread, and juice, among other things.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: El señor Wilfredo tiene 28 años, es casado y tiene dos hijos, los cuales ambos están estudiando en primaria. Su esposa trabaja como comerciante en el mercado. El señor Wilfredo tiene su negocio de venta de ropa de usada, El señor elabora pedidos a Managua y de allí le envían la mercadería. Cabe señalarse, el señor ya tiene cinco años de estarse dedicando a este negocio, el cual dio inicio con recursos propios, vendiendo en su casa de habitación y lo aprendió de sus padres, ya que ellos son comerciantes. El señor solicita el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de más mercadería, debido a que tiene bastantes encargos de ropas y zapatos, ya que estamos en los meses de buenas ventas. Su sueño por el momento es ampliar más el negocio y mantener la clientela para seguir trabajando y poder seguir manteniendo a su familia.
texts.en: Wilfredo is 28-years-old. He's married and has two children, both of whom are in elementary school. His wife works as a merchant in the market. Wilfredo has a second-hand clothes business. He makes his orders in Managua and from there they bring him his merchandise. He's had this business for five years. He started it with his own money, selling from his house, which he learned from his parents, who are also merchants. He's requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of more merchandise because he has many orders for clothes and shoes because it's the good selling season. His dream at this moment is to expand his business and maintain his clientele in order to continue working and be able to maintain his family.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Julia Maya

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Virgen De Monserrate.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Julia, tiene 40 años de edad, está separada pero de  esa relación  tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 8 años los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela.  Está en el Banco Comunal hace un año y le gusta porque  los intereses son bajos en relación a los otros Bancos.
 
Se dedica al comercio, vende productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos,  perfumería y accesorios de damas). Ella tiene un grupo de vendedoras a su cargo, Trabaja cuatro días a la semana unas tres horas por día. Lo que más vende son los perfumes y  bisutería, además de estos productos también vende ropa por catalogo.
 
Este crédito es para comprar  productos como: cremas, perfumes, bisutería y otros productos. Su sueño es  ser directora de Yanbal.
texts.en: In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the Reales Tamarindos Stadium, the members of the Virgen de Monserrate Community Bank meet every fifteen days. Here we meet Mrs. Julia. She is 40 years old and separated, but has two children ages 17 and 18 from this relationship. The children are in school and university. Julia has been part of the Community Bank for one year and she likes it because the interest rates are low compared to the other Banks. She is a merchant. She sells Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and women´s accessories). She has a group of sellers under her. She works four days a week, three hours a day. The products that she sells the most are perfume and costume jewelry. She also sells clothing through a catalogue. This loan is to buy products such as- creams, perfumes, costume jewelry and other products. Her dream is to be the head of Yanbal.

loans.use: To purchase creams, perfumes, costume jewelry and other Yambal products.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda Villareal A.  desea  crear su propio capital de trabajo mediante la venta de Cosmeticos  Amway. 
Ella siempre ha sido una excelente vendedora, es por eso que hace unos años se dedica  a la venta de cosméticos y productos de uso personal Amway.  Ella asegura que quiere aumentar sus ventas, invirtiendo un poco más, es por eso que necesita un préstamo de ₡500 000 (quinientos mil colones) para la compra de mas inventario. 
Ella es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal Guaitil, una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en: Yolanda Villareal A. wants to create her own working capital through the sales of Amway Cosmetics. She has always been an excellent salesperson, which is why she has sold Amway cosmetics and personal use products for years. She assures us that she wants to expand her sales through investing a little more. This is why she needs a loan of  ₡500 000 (five hundred thousand colones) for the purchase of more inventory. She is a member of the Empresa de Crédito Comunal Guaitil, one of the 100 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: the purchase of inventory

loans.name: Teresa Nelli

texts.es: Teresa Nelli se dedica a la venta de cereales entre otras cosas. Ella es una persona muy bien conocida en su vivienda en donde ofrece una gran variedad de sus productos. La Señora inicio con recursos propios este negocio lo inicio con ayuda de sus hijas ya que ellas le ayudaban en la venta y a iniciar con el poco capital que poseían. La experiencia que han tenido ha sido gratificante por lo que se siente orgullosa de tener este medio de vida. El financiamiento es para la compra de cereales, pinol, pinolillo entre otros.
texts.en: Teresa Nelli sells grains and other items. She is a very well-known person in her building, where she offers a large variety of products. She started this business with her own resources and the help of her daughters, since they helped her with the sales and start-up with the little capital that they had. Teresa´s experience has been rewarding, and she is proud to have this way of life. This loan is for the purchase of grains, pinol [flour made from toasted maize], and cornstarch, among other items.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Leonidas Lucas

texts.es: Leónidas se dedica a brindar el servicio de juego de billares. Hace más de 2 años que tiene este negocio. Ya que anteriormente tenía una mesa en mal estado el mismo se preocupo por componerla y así empezar este medio de vida fue así que se preocupo por salir adelante. Tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo 3 están a su cargo, por lo que siempre se ha preocupado por ser un padre responsable. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como mesa de billar, y proporcionarle mejoras a su local.
texts.en: Leónidas offers a billiards playing service. He has had this business for over 2 years. Since he previously had one table in bad condition, he took it upon himself to repair it. Thus began this mode of gaining income, and this is the way that he has decided to get ahead. He has 5 children of whom only 3 are under his care, and so he has always tried to be a responsible father. The loan will be used for the purchase of basic materials such as a billiards table, and to better stock his business.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: Alberto, de 30 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Martha de 22 años y lo que más desea es sobresalir en la vida. Muy temprano por la mañana, Alberto sale a trabajar en sus tierras que se encuentran a una hora de caminata, él tiene sembrado cacao, café y hojas de coca, cultivos que cuida con mucho cariño y esfuerzo, ya que sabe que de la buena cosecha que tenga, dependerá el sustento económico con el que cuente su familia. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de la  plaga de insectos que pueden afectar sus plantaciones, es por eso que nunca se olvida de fumigar sus tierras. En el futuro, desea comprar un carro, con el cual él mismo pueda transportar sus productos al mercado mayorista para la comercialización de sus productos. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP y no quiere dejar de pagar por falta de dinero, así que ya esta ahorrando para pagar sus cuotas, es de los pocos varones de su banco comunal, motivo por el cual siempre trata de ser responsable y respetuoso con las demás socias. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de abono para sus cultivos.
texts.en: Alberto, age 30, is a very unassuming and hard-working man. He lives in his own home with his wife Martha, age 22. What he most desires is to excel in life. Very early in the morning, Alberto leaves to work his lands, which are an hour's trek away. He has sown cocoa, coffee and coca leaves-- crops which he cares for with great care and hard work, since he knows that his family's sustenance depends on his good harvest. What he most enjoys about his work is sowing his lands. He has been doing this work for 20 years and finds that the hardest part is keeping his crops safe from the plague of insects that can affect his crops. Thus he never forgets to fumigate his lands. In the future, he wants to buy a car with which to transport his products to the wholesale market for sale. This is his fifth loan with MFP and he does not want to stop paying for lack of funds, so he is already saving to pay his quotas. He is one of the few men in his community bank, so he always tries to be responsible and respectful with the other members. With the 1500 soles, he will invest in the purchase of fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Fatima Del Rosario

texts.es: Fátima tiene 43 años. Su negocio es el destace de cerdo ella tiene otro negocio que es la venta de frutas y verduras. Ella es una joven muy responsable y disfruta de su actividad. Hace más de 9 años que se dedica a este negocio pues siempre está pendiente de mejorar s negocio que es el que le proporciona el alimento diario. Este crédito es para la compra de cerdos pues actualmente tiene ciertos pedidos pendientes de parte de sus clientes. Desea seguir incrementando su negocio.
texts.en: Fátima is 43. Her business is pig butchering, and she has another business where she sells fruits and vegetables. She is a very responsible youth and benefits from this work. She has had this business for over 9 years, and she is always improving her business, which is what provides her her daily bread. This loan is for the purchase of pigs as she currently has pending orders from her customers. She wants to continue expanding her business.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Eva Juana

texts.es: La Sra. Eva  tiene casa propia donD. vive junto a sus hijos, es cliente antigua en la institución, ella estuvo en el banco D. emprendimiento siempre unido D. la cual fue la presidenta, en el tercer ciclo se retiro por motivos D. salud. Ella tiene su taller D. costura en su domicilio y también se dedica junto a sus hijos a la venta D. muebles en un  mercado D. la ciudad. El crédito que esta solicitando es para comprar tejas para terminar D. construir dos cuartos en su casa. La Sra. Juana es responsable y trabajadora, les ayuda a sus hijos en sus trabajos que desempeñan y siempre los esta apoyando en todo, esta muy agradecido con la institución con el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Eva  has her own home where she lives with her children. She is an old customer of this institution. She was in the lending bank, always united with the president, but withdrew in the third cycle for health reasons. She has a sewing workshop in her home and also sells furniture with her children in a market in the city. The loan that she is requesting is to purchase slate to finish building two rooms in her house. Mrs. Juana is responsible and hard-working. She helps her children with their work and is always supporting them in everything. She is very grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: working capital, the purchase of construction materials

loans.name: Florentino

texts.es: Florentino, de 42 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Victoria de 35 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor educación. Todas las mañanas Florentino se esmera mucho en trabajar sus tierras y dejarlas muy fértiles, ya que sabe que de eso depende la calidad de su café, cacao y hojas de coca, los cuales posteriormente después de la cosecha llevará a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene mucha libertad para trabajar en sus tierras, ya que él mismo dispone de su tiempo. Lleva 25 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es hacer la limpieza de sus plantaciones de hojas de coca. Con el tiempo, desea comprar nuevas tierras, para incrementar su producción. Es el sexto crédito con MFP y se siente en la capacidad de pagar todas sus cuotas, es uno de los miembros más activos en su banco comunal, por eso es muy querido y respetado. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para hacer más fértiles sus tierras.
texts.en:
Florentino is 42 years old.  He is a very humble and hard-working man who lives in his own home with his wife, 35 year-old Victoria, and his 3 beloved children who he wants to provide with a better education.

Every morning Florentino takes a lot of care in working his land, making it very fertile, since he knows that the quality of his coffee, cacao and coca leaf crops depends on it.  Once he has harvested his crops, he takes them to the city of San Francisco to sell.  What he most likes about his work is that he has a lot of freedom to work on his land since he has his own time at his own disposal.  He has been in this business for 25 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work to be weeding his coca leaf plantations.  Over time he would like to buy new land to increase his production.

This is Florentino's sixth loan with MFP.  He feels capable of making his loan repayments.  He is one of the most active members of his community bank.  For this reason he is very well liked and respected.  He will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles he is requesting to buy more manure to make his land fertile.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure

loans.name: Gelacia

texts.es: Gelacia, de 48 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo que Gelacia realiza, es el cultivo de cacao, café y hojas de coca, todas las mañanas junto al mayor de sus hijos, sale a trabajar en sus tierras, ya que sabe que del buen cuidado que les brinde dependerá la calidad de los productos que llevará a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y darles el cuidado necesario, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los sacos de productos que lleva son muy pesados. Con el tiempo, desea comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar su producción. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP y esta ahorrando para pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, donde se siente muy contenta. Los mil nuevos soles solicitados, los invertirá en la limpieza de sus plantaciones de café.
texts.en:
Gelacia is 48 years old.  She is a very cheerful and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home with her 3 beloved children who she wants to provide with a better quality of life.  Gelacia's business is growing cacao, coffee and coca leaf.  She does this every morning together with her eldest child.  She works on her land and knows that the quality of the produce that she will take to sell in the city of San Francisco depends on the good care that she takes of her land.

Gelacia has been in this business for 20 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be transporting her produce since the sacks that she carries are very heavy.  Over time, she would like to buy more land to increase her production.

This is Gelacia's third loan with MFP and she is saving so that she can make her repayments on time since she doesn't want to inconvenience the other members of her community bank where she feels very happy.  She will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles she is requesting to invest in cleaning up and weeding her coffee plantations.

loans.use: To hire laborers to help her clean up and weed her plantations

loans.name: María Laura

texts.es:
La Señora. María Z. es socia del banco comunal Las Caleras, vive por el sector de la Virgen del Milagro en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por la belleza de su centro histórico, sus iglesias, su gran variedad en la gastronomía y su gente que conserva su cultura y tradiciones.

Doña María tiene 43 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 22, 16 y 5 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en la universidad, su segundo hijo estudia en el colegio y su ultima hija en una escuela del sector. Su esposo es de profesión mecánico industrial y tiene su propio taller, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de su suegro de manera independiente.

La Señora. María se dedica a la venta de pollos pelados, compra de pollos vivos, los pela y los vende por libras pero solo los días domingos desde la 6 a.m. hasta la 1 p.m., esta actividad la realiza hace 3 años, los demás días de la semana se dedica a ayudar a su esposo en el taller.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 8 años y le gusta por que tiene muy buenas amigas con quienes comparte gratos momentos en cada reunión.  El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de más pollos para continuar con su negocio. Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
María Z. is a member of the Las Caleras community bank.  She lives in La Virgen del Milagro sector of the city of Cuenca.  This city is known for the beauty of its historic center, its churches, the variety of its food and its people who conserve its culture and traditions.

María is 43 years old.  She is married and has 3 children aged 22, 16 and 5.  Her eldest son is studying at universiy, her middle son is studying at high school and her youngest daughter is studying at a local elementary school.  Her husband is an industrial mechanic and has his own workshop.  They do not have their own home and live independently in her father-in-law's house.

María sells skinned chickens.  She buys live chickens, skins them and then sells them by the pound.  She only does this on Sundays from 6.00am to 1.00pm.  She has been in this business for 3 years.  The other days of the week she helps her husband in his workshop.

María has been a member of her community bank for 8 years and she likes it because she has good friends with whom she spends pleasant moments during each meeting.  She will invest the money from her loan in buying more chickens so that she can continue in her business.  Her goal is to own her own home.

loans.use: To buy chickens

loans.name: Monjaras 2 Group

texts.es:
el grupo Monjaras 2 esta ubicado en el barrio el Porvenir, esta integrado por dos hombres y una mujer, ellos son muy unidos y trabajan duro para salir adelante con sus familias, a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellos realizan:

la señora Petronila P. es una mujer luchadora y dedicada a su trabajo, se dedica a la venta de abarroteria
en general, tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitacion, en el barrio en donde vive su negocio se 
encuentra en un lugar de facil acceso para la mayoria de personas que viven en dicha zona, ademas cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que es conductor de tractores  y le ayuda con todos los gastos del hogar.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir su pulperia.

el señor Pascual S. L. se dedica a la venta de mariscos, los distribuye en varios comedores y restaurantes y tambien a la mayoria de vecinos.
Pascual es un hombre con principios morales y religiosos. trabaja muy fuerte para sacar adelante a su hija.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mariscos.

el señor Herwin M. es una persona muy trabajadora,  se dedica a la venta de leña, actividad que realiza de lunes a sadado, entraga su producto a varias panaderias y comedores.el credito lo utilizara para la compra de leña.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
The Monjaras 2 Group is located in the neighborhood of El Porvenir. It is made up of two men and one woman. They are very cohesive and work hard to get ahead with their families. Below is a detailed description of the activities they carry out:

Mrs. Petronila P. is a determined woman dedicated to her work. She works selling general groceries. She has a small neighborhood store in the house where she lives. Her business is located in a place that is easy for the majority of the people living in the neighborhood where she lives to reach. She also benefits from the support of her husband. He is a tractor driver. He helps her with all the household expenses. She will use the loan to buy merchandise to supply her store.

Mr. Pascual S. L. works selling seafood. He distributes the seafood to several eateries and restaurants and also to the majority of his neighbors. Pascual is a man with moral and religious principles. He works very hard to help his daughter advance.  He will use the loan to buy seafood.

Mr. Herwin M. is a very hard working person. He works selling firewood. He carries out this work from Monday to Saturday. He delivers his product to several bakeries and eateries. He will use the loan to purchase firewood. He needs the profits to get ahead with his family.

loans.use: Purchase of corn, beans, rice, lard, sausages, soaps, bread, meats, pills, firewood, seafood, fish and shrimp

loans.name: Maria Sagrario

texts.es: Maria Sagrario tiene 31 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio, ella es una mujer responsable y reside en el barrio el rosario, ella se encarga de administrar su negocio. Fue iniciativa propia como una alternativa para tener ingresos y crecer económicamente. Actualmente solicitan un préstamo para la compra de mercadería. Su principal proyecto es que su negocio cuente con la mercadería que demandan los clientes, que sea prospero y que le ayude a cubrir las necesidades del hogar, ya que se acerca una buena temporada.
texts.en: Maria Sagrario is 31 years old, she sells general merchandise.  She has had this business for more than 5 years, and is a responsible woman who is in charge of managing it.  She resides in the Rosario neighborhood. She started the business as her own initiative to build an alternative means of income and economic growth.  She is currently seeking a loan to buy merchandise.  Her primary focus is to ensure that her business has the merchandise that clients demand as the high season approaches, so that it will be prosperous and cover her household necessities.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es:
Aracely es una mujer trabajadora de 39 años de edad, casada, con dos hermosos hijos. Teniendo el apoyo de su esposo quien labora como conductor. Hoy en día trabaja en una empresa privada de la zona franca como operaria de maquila.
Como objetivo de este financiamiento es para la construcción de un cuarto en el fondo del terreno ya que hasta ahora viven en casa de sus padres debido a que sus salarios son bajos y no han podido comenzar a construir. 
Lo que ahora atreves de este préstamo comenzaran a construir el arranque hasta donde llegue la inversión. Ya que como es primer crédito y no cuentan con mucha disponibilidad irán poco a poco para hacer su propia casa. Ya que hay otros gastos como: alimentación, básicos entre otros de uso personal y que tienen que equilibrarse.
Contentos ya que se hará posible una vivienda para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aracely is a hardworking, 39-year-old married mother with two lovely children. She has support from her husband, who works as a driver. She works for a private company as an assembly plant worker in a free trade zone.

She needs this loan in order to build a room in the back of their plot of land because they have been living in her parents' home due to their low wages, which have prevented them from home construction. With this loan, they will be able to start building until their investment runs out. Because this is their first loan and they do not have much availability, they have to build their house little by little. They must also balance other costs like food and personal use items. They are now happy that they will be able to have a home for their children.

loans.use: Home construction

loans.name: María De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora. María L. es socia del banco comunal Las Caleras, vive por el sector de Las Caleras en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por la belleza de su centro histórico, sus iglesias, su gran variedad en la gastronomía y su gente que conserva su cultura y tradiciones.

Nuestra socia trabaja en su panadería la que tiene hace 20 años, esta actividad la aprendió cuando trabajaba en una panadería desde muy corta edad, su pan elabora de lunes a sábado desde la 1 de la tarde hasta las 5 de la tarde y si se le termina el pan lo elabora en la madrugada.

La Señora. María tiene 52 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4  hijos de 30, 28, 27 y 25 años de edad, su primer hijo es soltero, trabaja y es quien ayuda  en la economía de la casa, su segunda hija  estudia en la universidad y trabaja para solventar sus gastos, su tercer hijo también estudia en la universidad y su ultima hija es profesional y trabaja como profesora. Su esposo es carpintero y labora en su propio taller, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.
 
Doña María es socia fundadora del banco comunal y le gusta porque son un gran grupo de mujeres que tienen una gran amistad. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de harina, manteca y muchos más materiales que necesita para la elaboración del pan. Su meta es crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria L. is a member of the Las Caleras loan group. She lives in the Las Caleras neighbourhood in the city of Cuenca, renowned for its beautiful historic center, its churches, its diverse cuisine and its people, who keep their culture and traditions.

Maria has worked at her bakery for the last 20 years. She learnt the job by working at a bakery from a young age. She makes bread Monday to Saturday from 1 pm to 5 pm and, if she runs out of bread, she also makes bread early in the morning. 

Maria is 52 years, married with 4 children aged 30, 28, 27 and 25 years old. The eldest son is single. He works and helps her with household expenses. The second daughter studies at the university and works to cover her expenses. Her third son also studies at the university and the youngest daughter works as a teacher. Her husband is a carpenter and works in his own workshop. With their joint efforts they have managed to build their own home. 

Maria is a founding member of the loan group and she enjoys it because it is a large group of people and they are all friends. She will invest the loan in the purchase of flour, butter and other ingredients needed to make bread. Her goal is to grow her business.

loans.use: Buy flour, butter, eggs, baking powder and other bread making ingredients.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es: Héctor, de 32 años, es un hombre muy amable y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Segundina de 28 años y sus 2 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. Los esfuerzos en cuidado y fertilización que Héctor realiza en sus cultivos, se ven reflejados en la calidad de sus productos, ya que el cacao, café y hojas de coca que cultiva son muy cotizados en el mercado de la ciudad de San Francisco que es donde vende sus productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras y lo hace con M. alegría, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que el transporte es muy escaso por la zona donde tiene sus cultivos. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras, para incrementar su producción. Es el noveno crédito con MFP, en sus primeros pagos fue muy puntual y espera poder serlo ahora también, es de los pocos varones de su banco comunal, por lo cual es muy querido por el resto de las socias. Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Hector, 32 years old, is a kind and hard-working man who lives in his own home with his wife Segundina, 28 years old, and their two children whom they strive to provide with a better future. The effort Hector has put into tending and fertilizing his crops is reflected in the quality of his products, such as cocoa, coffee and coca leaves, whose cultivation is in great demand in the markets of the city of San Francisco where he sells them.

What he likes most about his work is harvesting his land and he does so with joy.  He has been doing this for 15 years and considers the most difficult aspect to be transporting his products since means of transport are very scarce in the area where his crops are.  In time, he wants to buy more land in order to increase his production.

This is his ninth loan with MFP, in his earlier repayments he was punctual and expects to be able to do the same now.  He is one of the few men in his community bank, which makes him well esteemed to the rest of the members.  With the requested loan of three thousand Peruvian sol he will buy more bags of fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria Isabel tiene 50 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene 5 años de tener esta actividad con el paso del tiempo es que ha podido salir adelante. La mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan una gran variedad de productos. Con el paso del tiempo es que ella ha logrado obtener más experiencia con su negocio y al tratar a sus clientes. El motivo de su crédito es para la compra de calzado, ropa en general, cosméticos entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Maria Isabel is fifty-years-old and has been a merchandise vendor for five years, and over time she has been able to get ahead.  Most of her clients demand a wide variety of products.  With time she has succeeded in gaining more experience with the business and how to treat her clients.  She is seeking a loan to buy footwear, and clothing in general, cosmetics, and other items.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: María Agusta

texts.es:
La Señora. María C. es socia del banco comunal Las Caleras, vive por el sector del Tejar en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por la belleza de su centro histórico, sus iglesias, su gran variedad en la gastronomía y su gente que conserva su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora María tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 22, 18, 15 y 4 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado y vive independiente, su segundo hijo estudia en la universidad, su tercer hijo está en el colegio y su ultima hija en el pre kínder. Su esposo labora como carpintero, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña María se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de ropa, actividad que la realiza hace 2 años, vende puerta a puerta a sus amigas y conocidas pero solo medio día.  También labora realizando la limpieza de una casa, esta en este trabajo hace 10 años, labora de lunes a viernes.

Es el cuarto crédito que realiza en el  banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de más mercadería para la temporada de navidad. Su mayor sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Mrs. María C. is a member of the communal bank Las Caleras. She lives in the Tejar sector of the city of Cuenca. This city is known for the beauty of its historical center, its churches, its diverse cuisine and its people who conserve their culture and traditions.

María is 37 years old. She is married and has 4 children, aged 22, 18, 15 and 4. Her oldest son is married and lives on his own. Her second son goes to university, her third son is in high school, and her youngest  daughter is in pre-school. Her husband works as a carpenter. They don't own their own home and are renters.    

María works selling every kind of clothing. She has been doing this for 2 years. She sells door to door to her friends and acquaintances, but only for half the day. She also works cleaning a house. She has had that job for 10 years and works at it from Monday through Friday.  

This is the fourth loan that she has taken out in the communal bank and she is going to invest it in buying more merchandise for the Christmas season. Her greatest dream is to own her own house.

loans.use: To buy clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José, de 43 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y alegre, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Sonia de 43 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. Los largos días de trabajo que José tiene en sus chacras, le han hecho ver que tiene que trabajar muy duro para lograr una buena calidad en sus cultivos. Todas las mañanas, junto a los primeros rayos de sol, camina hasta sus chacras de cacao, café y hojas de coca, las  cuales están a una hora aproximadamente. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 25 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus tierras, ya que los químicos que usa son muy peligrosos. En adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar sus cultivos. Este es el décimo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente si desea acceder a otro crédito posteriormente. En su banco comunal, es un socio muy participativo. Con los dos mil doscientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para sus cultivos.
texts.en: José, 43, is a very simple and happy man. He lives in his own house with his wife Sonia, 43, and his 3 beloved children to whom he wishes to give a better future. The long work days that Jose has on his farms have made him see that he must work very hard to achieve good quality crops. Every morning, at the first rays of sunlight, he walks to his cocoa, coffee, and coca leaf farms approximately one hour away. What he most likes about his work is cultivating his land, and he does it with a lot of care. He has been doing this activity for 25 years and considers the most difficult to be spraying his land as the chemicals he uses are very dangerous. In the future, he hopes to buy new land in order to extend his crops. This is the tenth loan with MFP, and he knows he has to pay his installments punctually if he wants to access another loan later. He is an active member in his communal bank. With the two thousand two hundred soles he is requesting, he will buy more fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: To buy sacs of fertilizer for cocoa and coffe cultivation

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
María es una pequeña comerciante dedicada a trabajar. Madre de seis hijos. Su negocio es la venta de golosinas, helados y bisutería con once años trabajando. 
También cuenta con una entrada fija de alquiler de un cuarto. Su casa la ha venido mejorando con los préstamos que la institución ha dado, logro poner cerámica  a su casa, cambiar el techo y ahora seguirá dándole el toque final a su cocina con el piso y con la pintura para que quede en mejores condiciones. 
Para esto comprara los materiales necesarios para iniciar la obra. Feliz ya que cada día tiene una mejora a su vivienda. Gracias a los préstamos y apoyo de Afodenic que hace posible mejores vivienda a mujeres pobres en nuestro país.
texts.en:
María is a small businesswoman who is committed to working.  She has six children.  María's business is selling candies, ice cream and jewelry.  She has been doing this for eleven years.  María also has a fixed income from renting out a room.  She has been improving her home with loans from our institution.  She has managed to put down ceramic tiles in her home, replace her roof and now she will continue the work by providing some finishing touches to her kitchen, working on the floor and painting.  This will provide her with better conditions.

María will buy the materials that she needs to begin this work.  She is happy that there is a new improvement to her home every day, thanks to the loans and support from Afodenic that make housing improvements possible for poor women in our country.

loans.use: To buy building materials to finish her kitchen

loans.name: Soledad Fabiola

texts.es:
La Señora. Soledad T. es socia del banco comunal Las Caleras, vive por el sector que tiene el mismo nombre del banco comunal en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por la belleza de su centro histórico, sus iglesias, su gran variedad en la gastronomía y su gente que conserva su cultura y tradiciones.
 
Nuestra socia tiene 26 años de edad, es casada y  tiene 1 hijo de 6 años y  un bebe de 11 meses de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo es pintor de casas, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven cuidando la casa comunal del sector.
 
Doña Soledad se dedica a la venta de chuzos (carne en palito), actividad que la desempeña hace 2 años, empieza la preparación de su producto desde las 6 de la mañana y vende desde las 4 de la tarde hasta las 10 de la noche, sale a vender su producto en la vereda de la calle de lunes a sábados.

Se encuentra en su segundo crédito y fue su vecina quien la invito a formar parte del  banco comunal, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de carne, aceite, carbón, etc.  para continuar con su negocio. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Soledad T. is a member of the Las Caleras communal bank. She lives in the Las Caleras neighbourhood in the city of Cuenca, renowned for its beautiful historic centre, its churches, its diverse cuisine and its people, who maintain their culture and traditions. 
 
She is 26 years old, married with a 6 year old son and an 11 month old baby. Her eldest goes to school in the city. Her husband is a painter-decorator. They don´t own a house so they live in a communal house in the neighbourhood, which they look after. 

Soledad sells chuzos (meat skewers). She has been doing this for 2 years. She starts preparing the products at 6am in the morning and sells them from 4pm to 10pm. She sells her products in the street sidewalks from Monday through Saturday. 

This is her second loan. Her neighbour invited her to join the communal bank. She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of meat, oil, coal, etc to continue with her business. Her dream is to own her own house.

loans.use: Buy meat, oil, coal, etc.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: Rosa Maria tiene 51 años, esta Señora es muy emprendedora y disfruta mucho de su actividad como es la venta de ropa. Hace más de 7 años que tiene este negocio. Ella sale todos los días a vender sus diferentes productos ya que la mayoría de sus clientes siempre le están solicitando una gran variedad de productos. Rosa tiene muchos clientes como jóvenes, niños, adolecentes y público en general ella siempre busca la forma de comunicarse con ellos para complacer lo que le solicitan. El crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes y vestidos.
texts.en: Rosa Maria is 51 years old. She is very enterprising and greatly enjoys her clothes selling activity. She has had this business for more that 7 years. She goes out every day to sell her different products since the majority of her customers are always asking her for a large variety of products. Rosa has many customers including young people, children, adolescents and the general public. She always looks for a way to communicate with them in order to provide what they ask her for. This loan is for the purchase of pants, shirts, skirts, suits and dresses.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José, de 36 años, es un hombre muy amable y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Rosa de 30 años y sus 4 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. La actividad a la que se dedica José, es el cultivo de cacao, café y coca, las extensas tierras que posee, lo han convertido en uno de los principales productores de la zona. Sus productos los lleva a vender hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, donde ya tiene compradores esperándolo, ya que sus cultivos son de muy buena calidad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho empeño, lleva 25 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus plantaciones de las plaga de insectos que pueden afectar sus plantaciones. En el futuro, desea comprar nuevas tierras, para ampliar su producción. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, está dispuesto a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y para eso ya está empezando a ahorrar. En su banco comunal es un socio muy alegre y siempre esta muy al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan en las reuniones. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para sus cultivos.
texts.en: Jose, 36, is a friendly and hardworking man.  He lives in his own house with his wife Rosa, 30, and their 4 beloved children, for whom they want to provide a better quality of life.  Jose is a farmer who cultivates cocoa, coffee and coca on land that he owns.  He has become one of the leading producers in the area.  He takes his products to sell in the city of San Francisco, where many buyers await him, since his crops are of good quality.  What he likes most about his work is harvesting his lands, and he does this with a lot of dedication.  He has been doing this work for 25 years, and what he considers most difficult is to deal with the insect pests than can affect his cultivations.  In the future, he wants to buy some additional land to expand his production.  This is his 5th loan cycle with MFP, and he is prepared to make his payments on time; he is already beginning to save towards this end.  In his communal bank he is a very cheerful member who is always aware of the agreements that are reached in the meetings.  With the 2,000 Peruvian soles requested he will buy more organic fertilizer for his cultivations.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Doris

texts.en:
Doris is thirty-six years old.  She is married and shares her home with her husband and their four children.  The family owns their home, which is located in the village of Pueblo Libre in the district of Tambogrande.  It is a semi-tropical zone which is primarily populated by small farmers and ranchers.

Doris raises animals in corrals behind her home.  She raises goats, chickens, ducks and turkeys.  She feeds them on local plants and manufactured feed from local mills.  Her husband works as a field laborer on a large local farm.  He has permanent and consistent work.  Between these two income sources that family is able to manage a small level of savings and, with the animals, maintain a relatively stable income stream.

This will be Doris’s first loan with Edpyme Alternativa.  She plans to use the funds to purchase additional feed for her animals.  She hopes to be able to get a bulk discount and be able to obtain better feed so that her animals grow more rapidly and healthier.  Doris is very hard-working and well respected in the community.  Edpyme Alternativa is proud to be able to provide her with access to credit and assist her in her business propositions.

loans.use: Purchase additional feed for her animals

loans.name: Sabias Unidas Group

texts.es:
El Grupo Sabias Unidas está conformado por 13 socias, pertenecen al distrito de Yarinacocha, en el Departamento de Ucayali,  este grupo ha visto la manera de acceder al crédito  en forma grupal porque todas  se dedican a la misma actividad, que es  la venta de comida.  Su presidenta es la señora María Cristina Chávez I.,   que como la responsable del grupo está dando el ejemplo a las demás socias de cómo deben invertir en sus negocios.
Con su nuevo préstamo la señora cristina invertirá s/. 100 soles en 25 kg de  arroz, 25 kg azúcar, 6 litros de aceite,  un paquete de fideos,  y condimentos, s/. 50 soles en lo que es carnes, s/. 150 soles en lo que son enseres;  5 jarras de ½ litro, 1 doc. de vasos, 1 doc. de platos, 2 cucharones, 1 espátula, 2 tazones y 2 cuchillos y otros como gas. La señora Cristina tiene hijos en edad escolar y tiene que trabajar para sacarlos adelante.
El Grupo Sabias Unidas, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo de S/. 4,900 soles, distribuido de la sigueinte manera: la señora Sofía H. S/. 500.00 Soles, Iris Reátegui  s/.300.00 soles, Lulú M. S/. 500.00 soles, Carmen C. S/. 300.00 soles, Layli S. S/. 500.00 soles, Marcia C. S/.300.00 soles, Debby T. S/.300.00 soles, Clementina T. S/.300.00 soles, Digna C. S/.500.00 soles, Luz María Q. S/.500.00 soles, Deysi B. S/.300.00 soles, Silvia P. S/.300.00 soles  Este grupo trabaja en forma coordinada con sus socias tiene más de un año trabajando y están logrando mejorar su negocios y por lo mismo mejorar su calidad de vida de toda su familia, con este nuevo prestamos cada una invertirá en la compra de los enseres o insumo que les hace falta y priorizando sus necesidades.

En la foto, algunas socias se muestran con sus hijos.
texts.en:
The group Sabias Unidas is made up of 13 members who belong to the Yarinacocha district in the department of Ucayali. This group has chosen the way to access the loan in group form because they all work in the same activity, which is food sales. Their president is Ms. Maria Cristina C. I. who, as the manager of the group, is giving the example to the other members about how they must invest in their businesses. With her new loan, Cristina will invest 100 soles in 25 kg of rice, 25 kg of sugar, 6 litres of oil, a package of noodles, and condiments; 50 soles in meat; 150 soles in household equipment: 5 jugs of 1/2 litre, 1 dozen cups, 1 dozen plates, 2 ladles, 1 spatula, 2 bowls, and 2 knives and other things like gas. Cristina has school-age children and has to work in order to give them a good education.

The group Sabias Unidas is requesting a new loan of 4,900 soles distributed in the following way: Ms. Sofia H. 500.00 soles, Iris R. 300.00 soles, Lulu M. 500.00 soles, Carmen C. 300.00 soles, Layli S. 500.00 soles, Marcia C. 300.00 soles, Debby T. 300.00 soles, Clementina T. 300.00 soles, Digna C. 500.00 soles, Luz Maria Q. 500.00 soles, Deysi B. 300.00 soles, Silvia P. 300.00 soles. This group works in a coordinated form with its members, and has been doing so for more than a year. They are managing to improve their businesses as well as the quality of life of their entire families. With this new loan, each one will prioritize their needs and invest in the purchase of houshold equipment or supplies that they are lacking.   

In the photo some members are shown with their children.

loans.use: Purchase of supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Teodosa

texts.en:
Teodosa is fifty-six years old.  She is a single mother and she lives alone with her sixteen-year-old daughter.  The family owns their home, which is located in the zone of San Miguel Alto Cruceta in the district of Tambogrande.  It is a semi-tropical zone which is primarily populated by small farmers and ranchers.

Teodosa raises animals in corrals behind and around her home.  She has a number of cattle and sheep.  These animals she raises for meat and milk depending on the age and season.  In addition, she sells beer out of her home.  She attends to her small store  on Saturdays, Sundays, Mondays, and Tuesdays.

Teodosa has worked with Edpyme Alternativa in the past.  She has a good credit history and has always used her loans in a responsible manner.  She has requested this loan in order to expand her inventory of beer.  She hopes to grow her business and perhaps one day become a distributor.  She finds the profitability vs. risk is lower with the beer sales and therefore would like to increase the amount of investment in that activity.  She is a proud mother and a happy businesswoman.  We at Edpyme Alternativa are thankful for the opportunity to be able to work with women like Teodosa.

loans.use: Expand her inventory of beer

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
La señora Sara es socia del banco comunal Madre Coraje del distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 65 años de edad, es viuda y tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad.
La señora Sara se desempeña como modista (confecciona ropa), tiene un pequeño taller donde realiza sus confecciones, lleva trabajando con Manuela Ramos 3 años aproximadamente, con su trabajo puede solventar los gastos del hogar.
Este préstamo de  S/. 1000.00 soles lo invertirá en la compra de una remalladora de segunda mano, que mucha falta le hace, para que pueda dar mejor acabado a sus prendas de vestir.
La señora Sara agradece que Manuela Ramos le otorgue préstamos y sin más requisitos que su documento de identidad.
texts.en: Sara is a member of the community bank named Madre Coraje which is located in the district of Calleria in Ucayali. She is 65 years old, she is a widow, and she has 3 grown children. Sara is a seamstress (makes clothing). She has a small shop from where she makes her products. She has been with Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) for 3 years approximately. She is able to cover her household expenses with her business. This loan is in the amount of 1000 soles and it will be invested in the purchase of a second-hand over locker machine. She will use this machine to give a better finish to her products. Sara is very grateful to Manuela Ramos who gives her access to loans with only those id requirements.

loans.use: To purchase an over locker.

loans.name: Mauro Antonio

texts.en:
Mauro is forty-two years old.  He lives in the district of Las Lomas in the province of Piura in northern Peru.  It is a semi-tropical region largely populated by small farmers and ranchers.  Specifically, many residents have small fruit plantations or raise animals.  Mauro maintains a stable and happy home in Las Lomas.  He and his wife live together with their three children, mutually supporting each other.

Mauro raises sheep in corrals behind the family home.   He has a small herd that he raises for their meat and sells in local markets when they reach the appropriate size and weight.  In addition he has consistent contracts with local farms to complete various jobs as a farm hand including planting, weeding, thinning and harvesting.  Mauro’s wife manages a small business out of their home selling beer and chicha (a traditional beverage made out of fermented corn).  She attends to sales five days a week.

The requested loan will be used to purchase additional feed for the animals and expand the herd.  Mauro would like to continue to improve his family's income and independence from other parties by growing this in-house business.  He is proud to be able to earn a living for his family and work with his wife.  They are a strong couple with much success and more success to come.

loans.use: Purchase additional feed for the animals and expand the herd

loans.name: Kendel

texts.es: Kendel, de 21 años, es un joven padre de familia muy amable y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Linda de 17 años y su querida hija Nicol de 2 años, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. Los campos de sembrado que con tanto esfuerzo ha conseguido Kendel, son el principal sustento que tiene su familia, sus productos son muy solicitados en la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que su fama de cosechar cultivos de buena calidad, ya que le ayuda a vender sus productos a muy buenos precios. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de las plaga de insectos que pueden aquejar sus plantaciones. Lleva 6 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los sacos de cacao, café y hojas de coca al mercado mayorista, ya que son muy pesados y le cansan mucho. En adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras, para poder ampliar su producción. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy alegre y siempre pone orden en las reuniones. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará abono e insecticidas, para hacer más fértiles sus tierras.
texts.en:
Kendel is 21 years old.  He is a very kind and hard-working young father.  He lives in his own home together with his wife 17 year-old Linda and his beloved 2 year-old daughter Nicol who he would like to provide with a better future.

The land which Kendel has achieved through so much hard work are the main support for his family.  His produce is very much in demand in the city of San Francisco since he is well known for growing good quality crops.  This helps him to fetch very good prices for his produce.  What Kendel most likes about his work is protecting his crops from insect infestations which can damage his plantations.  He has been in this business for 6 years and he considers that the most difficult part of his work is transporting the sacks of cacao, coffee and coca leaf to the wholesale market because they are very heavy and tire him out.  In the future, he would like to buy more land so that he can expand his production.

This is Kendel's third loan from MFP.  He knows that this support will be very helpful to him in making progress in his work.  He is a very cheerful member of his community bank who always brings order to the meetings.  He will use the 500 Peruvian soles he is requesting to buy manure and insecticides to make his land more fertile.

loans.use: To buy manure and insecticides

loans.name: Nolan Yuran

texts.es: Nolan tiene 25 años, tiene 4 años de ser cliente de Fundación y con mucho orgullo ha logrado salir adelante.  Su negocio es la venta y compra de mercadería en general, hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio por lo que ha sido muy reconfortante para él. Uno de sus mayores desafíos ha sido que ofrece muy poca variedad de productos pues sus clientes siempre le están solicitando variedad en sus productos. Este crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, calzado, cosméticos entre otros actualmente tiene una gran variedad de pedidos.
texts.en:
Nolan is 25 years old.  He has been a client of Fundación Leon 2000 for 4 years and he has very proudly managed to get ahead in life.  His business is buying and selling general merchandise.  He has had his business for more than 4 years which has been very comforting for him.  One of his greatest challenges has been that he doesn't offer a very wide variety of products and his customers are always requesting a greater variety of products.

Nolan will use this loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, footwear, cosmetics, etc.  He currently has a large number of orders.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ½ box of tuna, 1 big box of soda crackers, 1 box of vanilla cookies, 1 box of filled cookies, 1 bag of sweets, ½ sack of rice, ½ sack of sugar, ½ box of oil, 1 pack of noodles, 5 trays of eggs, 1 pack of salt, 5 packs of soda, 3 packs of nectar drinks, 3 packs of bags

loans.name: Zaira Luz

texts.en:
Zaira is twenty-eight years old.  She shares her home with her husband and their two children.  The family owns their home which is located along the highway in the district of Razuri in the province of Ascope.  It is a desert region primarily populated by small farmers, retailers and other people involved in service sectors.

Zaira is a clothing saleswoman.  She sells clothing in the neighborhood near her home and local markets.  She sells clothing both out of her inventory and on request.  Sometimes she sells clothing on credit, collecting payments from customers on a weekly or bi-weekly basis.  Her clients greatly appreciate this flexibility as it allows them to maintain more stable income and expense streams.

Her husband is a laborer in a local factory.  He earns a stable income and has consistent hours.

This will be Zaira’s first loan with Edpyme Alternativa.  She plans to use the loan proceeds to purchase additional clothing so that she can meet the increased demand during the holiday season.  She hopes to be able to increase her market share and profitability for the long term through this immediate influx of capital.

loans.use: Purchase additional clothing so that she can meet the increased demand during the holiday season

loans.name: Jose De La Rosa

texts.en:
Jose is thirty years old.  He lives in the village of Yencala Bogiano near the city of Lambayeque.  It is an agricultural region in the coastal deserts of northern Peru, primarily populated by small farmers and mill workers.  He lives in his own home, which he shares with his wife and their two dependent children.

Jose and his wife raise pigs in corrals behind their home.  He purchases the pigs in the village or nearby farms, feeds and cares for them until they reach the appropriate size, and then each 15th of the month he butchers the animals for sale by the kilo.  This method of sale allows him to keep the majority of the profits himself, rather than selling the animals live to other wholesalers.

In addition to raising pigs, Jose owns a mototaxi which he drives in the village and surrounding area, providing transport to his neighbors.  He is proud to be able to assist his neighbors in meeting their daily needs, getting to work and transporting items after going shopping.

This will be Jose’s first loan with our institution.  He plans to use the funds to purchase additional animals and feed in order to expand his herd and improve his business.  He hopes to be able to increase the scale of his business to better take advantage of his land and the infrastructure he has to care for his animals.  He is a proud father and business man, with many plans for improving the lifestyle of his family.

loans.use: Purchase additional pigs and feed in order to expand his herd and improve his business

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La señora Sonia tiene 45 maños de edad, es socia del banco comunal  Madre Coraje, del distrito de calleria departamento de Ucayali, tiene 45 años, está casada y su esposo se desempeña como maestro panadero, tiene 3 hijos que están estudiando.
La señora Sonia lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos 5 años y lo ha sabido invertir adecuadamente, porque tiene una panadería, que ahora por fiestas de fin de año también realizan el servicio de asado de todo tipo de carnes.
Con el nuevo préstamo de S/. 2000.00 soles, Sonia invertirá en insumos para preparar panetones, como son: 20 kg  frutas confitadas, 10 kg  pasas, 1 botella de esencias,  2 kg de levadura,  5 sacos de harina,5 casilleros de huevo, 2 paquetes de bolsa, 1 ciento de papel para envoltura.
La señora Sonia  está feliz  porque está sacando adelante su negocio y además genera trabajo para 3 personas más que son sus trabajadores,  por ahora está con un horno artesanal, mas adelante piensa comprar un horno eléctrico que le hace mucha falta.
texts.en: Sonia is 45 years old and she is a member of the community bank Madre Coraje located in the district of Calleria in Ucayali. She is 45 years old, she is married, and her husband works as a master baker. They have 3 children who are attending school. Sonia has been working with loans through Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 5 years and she has been able to invest them adequately because she has a bakery. During the end of year holidays she also makes all types of roast meats. With her new loan of 2000 nuevos soles, Sonia will invest in the purchase   of ingredients to make panetone breads, including: 20kg of candied fruits, 10 kg of raisins, 1 bottle of extract, 2kg of yeast, 5 sacks of flour, 5 crates of eggs, 2 packages of bags, 1 package of paper for wrapping. Sonia is very happy because she is finding success in her business and she is able to create work for 3 other people. She currently works with a standard oven but in the future she hopes to purchase an electric oven that she needs very much.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients for baking.

loans.name: Silvia Edubi

texts.en:
Silvia is twenty-two years old.  She lives in the area of Haya D. la Torre in the city of Lambayeque.
